info.title: OPERA Cloud Reservation API
info.description:
APIs to cater for Reservation functionality in OPERA Cloud.

OPERA Cloud Reservations System provides a complete set of capabilities for creating and updating reservations. Reservations are a central feature of OPERA Cloud. As a key source of information, the reservation specifies a guest's arrival date, departure date, room type, rate, packages, and many other details. It is also a gateway to dozens of other functions that contribute to the guest's experience. All reservations in OPERA Cloud require a guest profile.

You can create profiles while booking a reservation. If a profile already exists, you can look it up (using getProfiles in CRM module) and attach it to the reservation during the reservation booking process using the Profile ID.

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 25.4.0.0.

get.description:
This API will allow a user to retrieve a list of reservations based on the search criteria specified in the request body. For example you can search for reservations using query parameters like first name, last name, arrival/departure date, external confirmation number.

OperationId:getExternalSystemReservations

parameters.name: extSystemCode
parameters.description: Code to identify the external system from which the request is coming. This is the ExternalSystem ID used to exchange information between OPERA and the external system.

parameters.name: externalReferenceList
parameters.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

parameters.name: recentlyAccessed
parameters.description: Mark this reservation as recently accessed.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

parameters.name: resvExternalReferencesToFetch
parameters.description: Define the external system(s) to return external reference ids for reservations. A maximum of 10 different external systems can be be provided for this parameter.

parameters.name: searchType
parameters.description: Represents Reservation search type Player Snapshot.

parameters.description: List of Hotels to support searches with multiple resorts for which traces are to be fetched.

parameters.description: Flag containing true or false value for reservation to be eligible for prior check in by guest using mobile device. Pass the 'true' or 'false' values when creating / modifying reservation to indicate whether a reservation is eligible for mobile check in yes / no. Upon fetch, the current state of the flag will show true or false.

parameters.description: Indicates that only reservations with deposit balance should be expected from the result.

parameters.name: hasOpenBalance

parameters.name: unlinkedOnly

parameters.name: actualArrivals
parameters.description: Indicates if reservations which have already arrived on the Search Date is required.

parameters.name: actualDepartures
parameters.description: Indicates if reservations which were expected to depart on the Search Date and have already checked, is required.

parameters.name: complimentaryReservations
parameters.description: Indicates if reservations where rate codes are marked as Complimentary Rates , is required. This flag should be used in conjunction with the Arrivals, Departures or StayOvers criteria.

parameters.name: dayOfArrivalCancels
parameters.description: Indicates if reservations which have cancelled on the Search Date which is also the day of arrival is required.

parameters.name: dayUse
parameters.description: Indicates if reservations which are day use reservation on the Search Date, is required.

parameters.name: earlyDepartures
parameters.description: Indicates if reservations which checked out early on the Search Date, is required.

parameters.name: expectedArrivals
parameters.description: Indicates if reservations which are expected arrivals for the Search Date and who have not yet arrived, is required.

parameters.name: expectedDepartures
parameters.description: Indicates if reservations which are expected departures for the Search Date and who have not yet departed, is required.

parameters.name: extendedStays
parameters.description: Indicates if reservations which have extended their stays on the Search Date, is required.

parameters.name: houseUseReservations
parameters.description: Indicates if reservations where rate codes are marked as House Use Rates , is required. This flag should be used in conjunction with the Arrivals, Departures or StayOvers criteria.

parameters.name: stayovers
parameters.description: Indicates if reservations which are StayOvers on the Search Date, is required.

parameters.name: stayDate
parameters.description: Date for searching the reservations. This is the date for which the search types are applicable. If date is not available, the business date will be used by default.

parameters.description: Define the external system(s) to return external reference ids for associated profiles for the reservation. A maximum of 10 different external systems can be be provided for this parameter.

parameters.name: fetchInstructions
parameters.description: Instruction on which of the reservation's elements are to be returned e.g. DailySummary will return summarized information for each day of the reservation. Instructions are cumulative i.e. if multiple instructions are sent in a request, then the combined reservation elements would be returned, elements will not be duplicated in the response.

parameters.name: allowedActions
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether the Enrollment is in progress or not for the Profile associated with this Reservation.

200.description: Return object to the request for information regarding a reservation.

parameters.name: dayOfArrivalCancels

parameters.name: dayUse

parameters.name: earlyDepartures
parameters.description: Indicates if reservations which checked out early on the Search Date, is required.

parameters.name: expectedDepartures

parameters.name: extendedStays

parameters.name: inventoryItems
parameters.description: Inventory Items to be searched, can only be used when searching for reservations at a single property with a maximum date range of 90 days. It is required to populate either Arrival From/To, Departure From/To, or the Stay Date filter(s)

parameters.description: Fetches the reservation having Guarantee Codes(Reservation Type) supplied here. Example guaranteeCodes=6PM

parameters.description: Name of the group of Linked Reservations to be searched.

parameters.description: Indicates that only reservations marked as Back to Back should be expected in the result.

parameters.description: Fetches linked Back to Back reservations with the specified Back to Back Date. Fetched reservations will be marked as Back to Back and they will either depart or arrive on the specified Back to Back day.

parameters.description: Scheduled Move Rooms Date Criteria. This will parameter be mandatory when search Type is ScheduledRoomMove.

parameters.description: Start of Scheduled Move Room Time Range Criteria (in 24 hour time format). Applicable when Search Type is ScheduledRoomMove.

parameters.name: scheduledRoomMoveEndTime
parameters.description: End of Scheduled Move Room Time Range Criteria (in 24 hour time format). Applicable when Search Type is ScheduledRoomMove.

parameters.name: scheduledRoomMoveStatus
parameters.description: Scheduled Move Room Status Criteria.

parameters.name: checkInInitiatedBy
parameters.description: This indicates who initiated the Check In/Advance Check In.Advance Check In functionality is available when the Advance Check In OPERA Control is active.

parameters.name: flexChar
parameters.description: Search by User Defined Character Field. Available to be used when searchType = Arrival, Arrived, InHouse, Departure or CheckedOut. Format for searching by User Defined Character field is UDFCXX:<SEARCH CRITERIA>. For example to search for reservations with the value 'Test123' in UDFC01 field use the value UDFC01:Test123

parameters.name: flexNum
parameters.description: Search by User Defined Number Field. Available to be used when searchType = Arrival, Arrived, InHouse, Departure or CheckedOut. Format for searching by User Defined Number field is UDFNXX:<SEARCH CRITERIA>. For example to search for reservations with the value '123' in UDFN01 field use the value UDFN01:123

parameters.name: flexDate
parameters.description: Search by User Defined Date Field. Available to be used when searchType = Arrival, Arrived, InHouse, Departure or CheckedOut. Format for searching by User Defined Date field is UDFDXX:<YYYY-MM-DD>. For example to search for reservations with a date of December 31, 2024 as a value in UDFD01 field use the value 'UDFD01:2024-12-31'.

parameters.name: pkgCategoryToFetch
parameters.description: Provide a package category code to return details for packages belonging to the specified category.

parameters.name: pkgForecastedConsumptionDateToFetch
parameters.description: Forecasted package consumption date for which package details are to be returned. When used,  the details of packages with a forecasted consumption date equal to the specified date will be returned for each reservation. Required if pkgCategoryToFetch is used.

get.description:
This operation fetches brief summary for the reservations and also supports the Global Parameter MAX ROWS FETCH COUNT.
By default this parameter is configured to support an overall fetch of 5000 Records in total, with maximum number of records that can be fetched at a time being 200 (limit). However, this parameter can be updated to support an overall fetch value being a valid number between 1 and 10000 with maximum number of records that can be fetched at a time being same i.e. 200 (limit).

Requests with an offset and limit sum exceeding the MAX ROWS FETCH COUNT configured would fail the request.

OperationId:getReservationsSummary

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the hotel where reservations is being searched.

parameters.name: advancedCheckedIn
parameters.description: This filter indicates if the reservation(s) has performed an Advance Check-In or not. Data fetched is for 30 days ahead of business date.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: This filter indicates number of records the API has to fetch.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: This filter is for the index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

parameters.name: preRegistered
parameters.description: This filter indicates whether the reservation is Pre-Registered for Internet Check-In or not. Data fetched is for 30 days ahead of business date.

parameters.name: arrivalDate
parameters.description: This filter is for the date of arrival of reservation.

parameters.name: departureDate
parameters.description: This filter is for the date of departure of reservation.

parameters.name: createDateTime
parameters.description: This filter is for the business date when reservation(s) was created in the system.

parameters.name: cancelledOn
parameters.description: This filter is for the date when reservation(s) was cancelled.

parameters.name: folioClosedOn
parameters.description: This filter is for the date when reservation(s) folio was closed.

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: This filter looks up reservations with this last Name. Data fetched is for +-2 business date only when passed alone.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: This filter is ID of the company used for the reservation. Data fetched is for +-2 business date only when passed alone.

parameters.name: guestNameId
parameters.description: This filter is ID of the guest.

parameters.name: reservationStatus
parameters.description: This filter is computed reservation status of the reservation(s).

parameters.name: confirmationNumber
parameters.description: This filter is ID of confirmation for the reservation.

parameters.name: externalReferenceNumber
parameters.description: This filter is ID of external reference for the reservation.

parameters.name: cancellationNumber
parameters.description: This filter is ID of cancellation for the reservation.

parameters.name: membershipNumber
parameters.description: This filter is used for looking up reservations with this membership number. Last Name is required along with membership number to filter the data.

parameters.name: registeredCardNumber
parameters.description: This filter is unique identifier of the registration card number. Last Name is required along with registration card number to filter the data.

parameters.name: balance
parameters.description: This filter checks reservations with balance amount greater than or equal to this amount. Departure date is required along with balance to filter the data.

parameters.name: roomId
parameters.description: This filter is for room number.

200.description: Response that contains fetched reservation's delivery history.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the hotel where reservation is searched based on reservation ID.

parameters.name: reservationPackagesInfo
parameters.description: Method to change/modify a reservation package on an existing reservation. The main information required are the Package Code, Resort, RateCode(if applicable), Original Begin Date(if applicable) and Original End Date(if applicable). These are the criteria by which the package will be identified in order to be modified/changed. The elements that can be changed are the Quantity, Excluded Quantity, Unit Price and Unit Allowance if existing. For RateCode packages, the begin date and end date cannot be changed. For non-RateCode packages, the begin date or end date can be changed.

200.description: Response Body.

get.description:
Use this API to get the room calendar for your Hotel.

OperationId:getRoomCalendar

This API allows a time span of 366 days.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the hotel where reservation is searched based on reservation ID.

parameters.name: advanceCheckedIn
parameters.description: If true, then filter room results to rooms with Advance Checked In Reservations.

parameters.name: assignedRooms
parameters.description: If 'Y', then filter room results to rooms that are assigned to guest.

parameters.name: componentRooms
parameters.description: If 'Y', then filter room results to component rooms.

parameters.name: connectingRoomsOnly
parameters.description: If 'Y', then filter room results to only connecting rooms.

parameters.name: backToBackOnly
parameters.description: Indicates that only reservations marked as Back to Back should be expected in the result.

parameters.name: scheduledRoomMoveOnly
parameters.description: Indicates that only reservations having scheduled room moves should be expected in the result.

parameters.name: dueOut
parameters.description: If 'Y', then filter room results to rooms with Due Out Reservations.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The ending value of the date range.

parameters.name: isSortDescending
parameters.description: If true, then fetch result will be sorted in descending order.

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: Page index to be retrieved.

parameters.name: partiallyAssignedRooms
parameters.description: If 'Y', then filter room results to component rooms that have at least one of its rooms assigned to guest.

parameters.name: recordsPerPage
parameters.description: Number of records per page.

parameters.name: roomConditions
parameters.description: If 'Y', then filter room results to rooms with Room Conditions.

parameters.name: ownerRoomsOnly
parameters.description: If 'Y', then filter room results to rooms with rotation rooms only. It is supported only if OPERA Control Room Rotation is active.

parameters.name: ownerExclusiveOnly
parameters.description: If 'Y', then filter room results to rooms that are exclusive to the owner. It is supported only if OPERA Control Room Rotation is active.

parameters.name: sortingBy
parameters.description: A collection of supported sorting for room calendar.

parameters.name: includeRoomMoveHistory
parameters.description: Include Room Move History in result.

parameters.name: includeComponentRoomBlockOutDates
parameters.description: Include information about Component Room Reservation dates when fetching a component suite.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The starting value of the date range.

parameters.name: unassignedRooms
parameters.description: If 'Y', then filter room results to rooms that are not yet assigned to guest.

parameters.name: roomId
parameters.description: Room search filter.

parameters.name: roomType
parameters.description: Room Type search filter.

parameters.name: roomClass
parameters.description: Room Class search filter.

parameters.name: floor
parameters.description: Floor search filter.

parameters.name: roomFeature
parameters.description: A code representing a room feature.

parameters.name: roomStatus
parameters.description: Simple type for room status instructions to be used in requests for fetching housekeeping rooms. Valid status values are Clean, Dirty, Pickup, Inspected, OutOfOrder, OutOfService.

parameters.name: smokingPreference
parameters.description: Smoking Preference filter.

parameters.name: showRoomMoveSegments
parameters.description: If set to true then reservations having past or future room moves will come according to the exact stay dates in the rooms.

parameters.name: flexChar
parameters.description: Search by User Defined Character Field. Available to be used when searchType = Arrival, Arrived, InHouse, Departure or CheckedOut. Format for searching by User Defined Character field is UDFCXX:<SEARCH CRITERIA>. For example to search for reservations with the value 'Test123' in UDFC01 field use the value UDFC01:Test123

parameters.name: flexNum
parameters.description: Search by User Defined Number Field. Available to be used when searchType = Arrival, Arrived, InHouse, Departure or CheckedOut. Format for searching by User Defined Number field is UDFNXX:<SEARCH CRITERIA>. For example to search for reservations with the value '123' in UDFN01 field use the value UDFN01:123

parameters.name: flexDate
parameters.description: Search by User Defined Date Field. Available to be used when searchType = Arrival, Arrived, InHouse, Departure or CheckedOut. Format for searching by User Defined Date field is UDFDXX:<YYYY-MM-DD>. For example to search for reservations with a date of December 31, 2024 as a value in UDFD01 field use the value 'UDFD01:2024-12-31'.

uniqueID_Type.description: An identifier used to uniquely reference an object in a system (e.g. an airline reservation reference, customer profile reference, booking confirmation number, or a reference to a previous availability quote).

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

instanceLink.description: Metadata describing link description objects that MAY appear in the JSON instance representation.

href.description: URI [RFC3986] or URI Template [RFC6570]. If the value is set to URI Template, then the "templated" property must be set to true.

rel.description: Name of the link relation that, in addition to the type property, can be used to retrieve link details. For example, href or profile.

templated.description: Boolean flag that specifies that "href" property is a URI or URI Template. If the property is a URI template, set this value to true. By default, this value is false.

method.description: HTTP method for requesting the target of the link.

targetSchema.description: Link to the metadata of the resource, such as JSON-schema, that describes the resource expected when dereferencing the target resource..

operationId.description: The operationId of the path you can call to follow this link.  This allows you to look up not only the path and method, but the description of that path and any parameters you need to supply.

title.description: Exact copy of the "summary" field on the linked operation.

warningsType.description: Used in conjunction with the Success element to define a business error.

warningType.description: Used when a message has been successfully processed to report any warnings or business errors that occurred.

shortText.description: An abbreviated version of the error in textual format.

code.description: If present, this refers to a table of coded values exchanged between applications to identify errors or warnings.

docURL.description: If present, this URL refers to an online description of the error that occurred.

status.description: If present, recommended values are those enumerated in the ErrorRS, (NotProcessed Incomplete Complete Unknown) however, the data type is designated as string data, recognizing that trading partners may identify additional status conditions not included in the enumeration.

tag.description: If present, this attribute may identify an unknown or misspelled tag that caused an error in processing. It is recommended that the Tag attribute use XPath notation to identify the location of a tag in the event that more than one tag of the same name is present in the document. Alternatively, the tag name alone can be used to identify missing data [Type=ReqFieldMissing].

recordId.description: If present, this attribute allows for batch processing and the identification of the record that failed amongst a group of records. This value may contain a concatenation of a unique failed transaction ID with specific record(s) associated with that transaction.

type.description: The Warning element MUST contain the Type attribute that uses a recommended set of values to indicate the warning type. The validating XSD can expect to accept values that it has NOT been explicitly coded for and process them by using Type ="Unknown".

rph.description: Reference Place Holder used as an index for this warning.

departureReservationInfo.description: Information related to the departure reservation.

reservationGuest.description: Collection of guests associated with the reservation.

reservationMemberships.description: List of reservation memberships which are attached from profile.

sharedGuests.description: Collection of guests who share this reservation.

reservationPaymentMethod.description: Payment method used for this reservation

specials.description: Set of reservation preferences which belongs to the Specials group.

displayColorDetails.description: Information of reservation display color, determined based on OPERA parameter RESERVATION_COLOR_DEFINITION

reservationIndicators.description: Indicators of additional information attached to the reservation

sourceOfSale.description: Point of Sale of reservation. Identifies the entity/channel who made the reservation.

waitlist.description: Information regarding why reservation has been/was waitlisted. This could hold information as history even if reservation is not in Waitlist status anymore.

queue.description: Information about the time and duration this reservation was on Queue for Checkin.

housekeeping.description: Information regarding housekeeping for this reservation.

cashiering.description: Holds cashiering related information for the reservation.

taxType.description: This stores the code for the type of tax calculation especially with tax exemption, etc.

revenuesAndBalances.description: Revenues and Balances Amount summary for the reservation.

mobileNotifications.description: Denotes the status of Room Ready, Key Ready messages.

advanceCheckIn.description: Information relating to Reservation's Advance Checked In state and Expected Time of Return

welcomeOffer.description: This flag will determine wheather the reservation is eligible for Welcome Offer or not.

cancellationInfo.description: Information regarding why reservation has been/was cancelled.

date.description: Date when reservation was last cancelled.

keyCount.description: Number of keys created for the reservation.

roomStayReservation.description: Boolean True if this reservation is reserving rooms. False if it is only reserving services.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee responsible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

purgeDate.description: Date an item will be purged from a database (e.g., from a live database to an archive).

reservationStatus.description: Indicates the status of the reservation.

computedReservationStatus.description: Indicates the status of the reservation.

walkInIndicator.description: When true, indicates the reservation is for a guest that walks-in without a reservation. When false, the reservation is not a walk-in.

accessRestriction.description: Indicates user restriction on the reservation based on the Access exclusion functionality such as Restriction on Changes, Cancellation or both.

commissionPayoutTo.description: If not null, reservation is considered to pay out commission to either Travel Agent, Source or both.

preRegistered.description: Defines if the reservation is pre-registered or not.

openFolio.description: Returns true when reservation has an open folio.

allowMobileCheckout.description: Flag containing true or false value for reservation to be eligible for self-checkout by guest using mobile device . Pass the 'true' or 'false' values when creating / modifying reservation to indicate whether a reservation is eligible for mobile checkout yes / no. Upon fetch, the current state of the flag will show true or false.

allowMobileViewFolio.description: Attribute AllowMobileViewFolio is set to true when the reservation is eligible for viewing folio using mobile device.

optedForCommunication.description: Attribute OptedForCommunication is set to true when the guest has opted for receiving communicationsl related to the reservation.

roomFeatures.description: Set of reservation preferences which belongs to the Room Features.

fiscalInfo.description: Fiscal related information for a reservation.

parentReservationHotelId.description: Property associated with the Linked Reservation that serves as parent to this reservation.

scheduledRoomMoveInfo.description: Scheduled Room Move information for a reservation.

checkInInitiatedBy.description: This indicates who initiated the Check In/Advance Check In.Advance Check In functionality is available when the Advance Check In OPERA Control is active.

pkgConsumptionInfo.description: Package consumption information linked to the reservation, including package code, description, category, and consumption details.

externalReferencesType.description: This type contains unique information of external reference.

externalReferenceType.description: This type contains unique information of external reference.

id.description: Unique ID of external reference.

idExtension.description: Additional identifying value assigned by the creating system for the external reference number. It is only applicable to reservation external references.

stayInfoType.description: Details on the Room Stay including Guest Counts, Time Span of this Room Stay, pointers to Res Guests, guest Memberships, Comments and Special Requests pertaining to this particular Room Stay and finally financial information related to the Room Stay, including Guarantee, Deposit and Payment and Cancellation Penalties.

originalTimeSpan.description: The Original Time Span covers the Room Stay dates of the original reservation.

bookingTimeSpan.description: The booking time span of the reservation, only applicable when time increments are being used.

expectedTimes.description: The expected arrival, return and departure times of the guest.

adultCount.description: A collection of Guest Counts associated with Room Stay.

childCount.description: A collection of Child Counts associated with Room Stay.

childAges.description: Defines Children's Ages. Number of children ages mentioned may mot match with children counts.

childBuckets.description: Defines children counts with Age Qualifying Group(Child Bucket#1) classification.

roomOwnershipType.description: Provides the information of the assigned reservation room is an Owner, Referral or regular room.This value is returned when Room Rotation OPERA Control is active and room number is assigned to a reservation.

points.description: The Points contains the number of points used to book a particular room type.

rateSuppressed.description: Whether this rate should be suppressed from view

reservationBlock.description: Key information about the block for this reservation.

bookingChannelCode.description: Classifies the medium(Channel field on reservation screen) through which the reservation is made.

fixedRate.description: True if the rate is a fixed rate, otherwise false

totalAmount.description: The total amount charged for the Room Stay including additional occupant amounts and fees. If TaxInclusive is set to True, then taxes are included in the total amount.

guarantee.description: The guarantee information associated to the Room Stay. A maximum of 5 occurances are available for use depending on the context.

sourceCodeDescription.description: Description of the source of business.

roomTypeCharged.description: Room type code that was charged

depositPayments.description: A collection of deposit and/or payments for the Room Stay.

guestServiceStatus.description: Service Status of In House guest like DND or MUP

scheduledCheckoutTime.description: Indicates that this reservation is scheduled for automated check out.

roomNumberLocked.description: When true, indicates a room number cannot be changed. When false, indicates a room number may be changed.

pseudoRoom.description: True indicates as pseudo room type. This is usually used for a posting master reservation.

assignedByAI.description: Represents the room was assigned by AI Room Assignment.

upgradedByAI.description: Represents the room was assigned by AI Room Assignment.

roomAvailableNights.description: Number of nights this room is avaiable if room is assigned to reservation

backToBack.description: This attribute indicates if the linked reservation is marked as Back to Back or not.

backToBackSequence.description: This attribute represents Back To Back Sequence of Linked Reservations(e.g. '1 of 2' i.e, 1 indicates Sequence Position of total count 2). This is applicable when OPERA control Back to Back Handling for Linked Reservations is active.

backToBackGroupId.description: This attribute represents a common identifier for a subgroup of linked reservations marked as Back to Back in a group of linked reservations.

timeSpanType.description: Allows for a choice in description of the amount of time spanned by this type. EndDate specifies a specific date, while Duration provides a measure of time to add to the StartDate to yield end date.

resExpectedTimesType.description: Holds the Arrival and Departure Time Information

pointsType.description: The Redeem Points contains the number of points required to book a room type.

awardsType.description: Awards type for the award type rate code.

points.description: No of points required to book this Room Stay.

reservationBlockType.description: Key information about the block for a reservation.

blockIdList.description: Collection of unique block identifiers for the reservation.

blockName.description: The Name of the block that is attached to the reservation.

hotelId.description: This is the HotelCode of the Block.

resGuaranteeType.description: Validations type record returned after Validations are done.

promotionType.description:
Type to specify a rate promotion. Usually attached to a reservation to indicate a specific promotion is applied to the reservation.

Note: For putReservation when promotion type element is sent with no value, existing promotion codes on the reservation will be removed.

promotionCode.description: Promotion code associated with the rate plan.

promotionName.description: Promotion code Name associated with the rate plan.

couponCode.description: Promotion Coupon Code when promotion is setup to have a valid coupon code.

guestHousekeepingServiceRequestType.description: Possible values for the Guest Service Status.

resGuestInfoType.description: Specifies Company or Travel Agent profile using IATA or Corp. No.

membership.description: The Membership object identifying the frequent customer reward program.

namePrefix.description: Salutation of honorific. (e.g., Mr. Mrs., Ms., Miss, Dr.)

givenName.description: Given name, first name or names

alternateGivenName.description: Alternate given name, first name or names

middleName.description: The middle name of the person name

nationality.description: Affiliation or ethnicity to a particular country.

vip.description: The supplier's ranking of the customer (e.g., VIP, numerical ranking).

address.description: Address information that is attached to the reservation guest

anonymization.description: Provides information about the guest's anonymization status

accompanyGuests.description: List of guest names that are accompanying the reservation guest

guestLastStayInformation.description: Contains information regarding the last stay of this guest.

guestRestricted.description: True indicates there are restrictions associated with the current profile.

registrationCardNo.description: Unique identifier of the police registration card number.

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

externalReferences.description: External References information for this Profile. Will be returned in getReservations and getHotelReservations when the 'profileExternalReferencesToFetch' query parameter is sent.

membershipInfoType.description: The Membership object identifies the frequent customer reward program.

membershipId.description: Membership ID Number(Unique ID from the memberships table).

programCode.description: The code or name of the membership program ('Hertz', 'AAdvantage', etc.).

bonusCode.description: The code or name of the bonus program. BonusCode can be used to indicate the level of membership (Gold Club, Platinum member, etc.)

membershipTypeDesc.description: The description of the ProgramCode.(Delta Previlige for code DP)

membershipLevelDesc.description: The description of the Bonus Code.(Platinum for code P)

accountId.description: The account identification or membership card number for this particular member in this particular program.

membershipLevel.description: The code or name of the membership level and indicates the level of membership (Gold Club, Platinum member, etc.). This is same as the BonusCode.

playerRanking.description: Ranking assigned to the Player Profile by the Gaming system.

namePrefixType.description: Salutation of honorific. (e.g., Mr. Mrs., Ms., Miss, Dr.)

givenNameType.description: Given name, first name or names

countryNameType.description: Used for Character Strings, length 0 to 200 - It indicates country/nationality description.

value.description: Used for Character Strings, length 0 to 200.

code.description: Code for a country or a nationality.

displayCountryFlag.description: Setting this to true will display the guest profile's country flag in the OPERA Cloud user interface, if it is configured.

vIPType.description: The supplier's ranking of the customer.

addressSearchType.description: Address Details such as city, state, country, postal code etc.

cityName.description: City (e.g., Dublin), town, or postal station (i.e., a postal service territory, often used in a military address).

streetAddress.description: First Line of Street Address. For profile search it matches the first Address line.

excludeNoCity.description: When true indicates that only profiles with city will be fetched.

anonymizationType.description: Provides information about guest's anonymization status.

anonymizationStatus.description: Status of anonymization such as Requested or Anonymized.

firstName.description: Given name, first name or names

fullName.description: String representation of the full name

registrationCardNo.description: Unique identifier of the police registration card number.

profileIdList.description: Unique identifiers for the Profile for both internal and external systems. In case of Travel Agent the IATA code and in case of Company can be any form of identifier as id.

externalReferences.description: External References information for this Profile. Will be returned in getReservations and getHotelReservations when the 'profileExternalReferencesToFetch' query parameter is sent.

profileIdList.description: Unique Id that references an object uniquely in the system.

guestLastStayInfoType.description: Contains last stay related details of the guest.

lastStayRoom.description: Room Number where the guest stayed.

lastStayRate.description: The Rate amount of the guest's last stay.

totalStay.description: The total number of previous stay of the guest.

resSharedGuestInfoType.description: Contains information regarding the share reservation.

firstName.description: Given name, first name or names

fullName.description: String representation of the full name

profileId.description: An identifier used to uniquely reference an object in a system (e.g. an airline reservation reference, customer profile reference, booking confirmation number, or a reference to a previous availability quote).

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

idExtension.description: Additional identifying value assigned by the creating system.

externalReferences.description: External References information for this Profile. Will be returned in getReservations and getHotelReservations when the 'profileExternalReferencesToFetch' query parameter is sent.

emailFolioInfo.description: Information on an email for the customer.

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

confidential.description: Flag indicating a billing window (2-8) as confidential. Applied only when Confidential Billing Window Opera Control is active.

resPaymentCardType.description: Information on a credit card for the customer.

approvalCode.description: Approval code sent by the credit card company on a successful authorization.

cardType.description: Indicates the type of credit card from a defined list

userDefinedCardType.description: Indicates the user defined credit card type if credit card type from a defined list is not provided

expirationDate.description: Expiration date of the credit card

expirationDateMasked.description: Masked Expiration date of the credit card

storeToCreditCardWallet.description: Indicate whether the credit card will be stored to the credit card wallet or not.

processing.description: This contains information on whether EFT is enabled. A value of 'C' indicates EFT is enabled and 'M' indicates manual authorization is available for this payment card type.

cardPresent.description: Flag to determine if the credit card was swiped/manually entered , This element is only used when PAYMENT SERVICE DIRECTIVE(PSD) Opera Control is active.

cardOrToken.description: This contains information on whether credit card is tokenized (token enabled). A value of 'Token' indicates credit card is token enabled and 'CardNumber' indicates non token environment for this payment card type.

citId.description: Customer Initiated Transaction(CIT) Id for Credit Cards. This is only used when PAYMENT SERVICES DIRECTIVE (PSD2) Opera Control is active.

cardTypeType.description: This is required for Credit Card Payment Methods. This indicates the type of Credit Card associated with this payment method.

cardNumberTypeType.description: Simple type for indicating if credit card number is tokenized.

authorizationRuleType.description: Configured rule for computing the amount to authorize.

amount.description: The amount applicable to the authorization rule.

percent.description: A percentage value if the authorization rule is percentage based.

emailType.description: Information on an email for the customer.

type.description: Defines the purpose of the e-mail address (e.g. personal, business, listserve).

primaryInd.description: When true, indicates a primary information.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee responsible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

reservationFolioWindowType.description: Folio window view which holds the set of folios for a reservation.

payeeId.description: Opera name id of the payee.

count.description: Indicates number of occurrences of the indicator.

housekeepingRoomStatusType.description: Simple type for room status instructions to be used in requests for fetching housekeeping rooms. Valid status values are Clean, Dirty, Pickup, Inspected, OutOfOrder, OutOfService.

searchMatchesType.description: List of Generic Name-Value-Pair Parameters used for super search matches.

searchMatchType.description: Search match indicating attribute and the matching value.

sourceOfSaleType.description: Point of Sale of reservation. Identifies the entity/channel who made the reservation.

sourceType.description: Type of entity/channel who made the reservation..

sourceCode.description: The entity/channel who made the reservation.

waitlistResType.description: Information regarding why reservation is being /has been waitlisted.

description.description: Description why the reservation is being /has been waitlisted.

reservationQueueInformationType.description: Information regarding the Date, Duration and Priority of the reservation on Queue for Check in.

timeSpan.description: Allows for a choice in description of the amount of time spanned by this type. EndDate specifies a specific date, while Duration provides a measure of time to add to the StartDate to yield end date.

durationInSeconds.description: The total duration, in seconds, the reservation is on Queue.

guestTextInfo.description: Information for the message sent to the user

priority.description: The Queue Priority given to this reservation.

averageQueueTimeToCheckIn.description: The average time, in seconds, a reservation was on queue prior to Check-In.

averageQueueTimeCurrentReservations.description: The average time, in seconds, of the reservations currently in queue.

queueDate.description: The Business date on which the reservation was due to arrive and is currently placed on Queue for Check In.

queueTextInfoType.description: Information regarding the message sent to guest.

sentTime.description: Time the text was last sent to the user.

sentBy.description: User name of the user who sent message.

resHousekeepingType.description: Holds housekeeping turndown service information for the room.

turndownRequested.description: Indicates whether guest wants turndown facility or not.

expectedServiceTime.description: Expected Start Time for housekeeping task(s).

roomStatus.description: Current room status. Current room status is populated only if room is assigned to the reservation and reservation is due in or in house.

revenuesAndBalances.description: Revenues and Balances Amount summary for the reservation.

billingPrivileges.description: Billing privileges set on the reservation.

bedTaxReporting.description: This stores the information for Bed Tax Reporting. Mainly used in Maldives.

folioTexts.description: Additional text fields to display on the folio.

compAccounting.description: Information regarding comp accounting on the reservation.

reservationPreConfiguredRoutingInstructi.description: Information regarding the selected preconfigured routing instruction on the reservation. This will be used when Multiple Promotion Code Comp Routings is inactive.

lastRoomAndTaxPostedDate.description: Date of the last Room And Tax posting. Used primarily to know the date in case of Advance Billing.

reverseCheckInAllowed.description: This attribute is to verify if reverse check-in is allowed for the reservation.

reverseAdvanceCheckInAllowed.description: This attribute is to verify if reverse advance check-in is allowed for the reservation.

transactionsPosted.description: Specifies whether reservation has a financial transaction associated with it.

reservationPreConfiguredRoutingInstructi.description: Information regarding the selected preconfigured routing instructions on the reservation. This will be used when Multiple Promotion Code Comp Routings is active.

resRevenueBalanceType.description: Revenue and Balance Amount summary for the reservation.

totalFixedCharge.description: Total Fixed Charges on the reservation.

totalPayment.description: Total payment received for the reservation.

roomRevenue.description: Room Revenue generated by the reservation.

foodAndBevRevenue.description: Food and Beverage Revenue generated by the reservation.

otherRevenue.description: Other Revenue generated by the reservation.

nonRevenue.description: Total Non Revenue posted on the reservation.

totalRevenue.description: Total Revenue generated by the reservation.

billingPrivilegesType.description: This stores the information for Bed Tax Reporting. Mainly used in Maldives.

excludeFromAutoAuthorization.description: Indicates if the reseravtion will be excluded from auto athorization of Credit Cards.

postingRestriction.description: Flag used by interface program during check in.

preStayCharging.description: Indicates if the reservation has charging privileges before arrival.

postStayCharging.description: Indicates if the reservation has charging privileges after checkout.

videoCheckout.description: Indicates if the guest can do video checkout

allowAutoCheckin.description: Indicated if a new reservation should be created and automatically checked in whenever the room is checked out. Available for pseudo room types only.

autoSettlement.description: Indicates if the is a candidate for auto folio settlement.

autoSettlementType.description: The folio settlement type for auto folio settlement.

autoSettlementFreq.description: The interval of days between each auto folio settlement.

creditLimitAutoPay.description: Indicates if the reservation will be included in the Automatic Credit Limit Overages process and also be listed in the Credit Limit Overages screen results.

reservationTaxTypeInfo.description: Provides information about the Tax Type.

taxExemptNo.description: Tax exempt number on the profile.

bedTaxReportingType.description: This stores the information for Bed Tax Reporting. Mainly used in Maldives.

taxRegistrationNo.description: Tax Registration Number for Maldives Bed Tax Reporting.

folioTextsType.description: This stores the description for the type of tax calculation especially with tax exemption, etc.

text.description: Additional text field to display on the folio.

row.description: Row number of the additional text.

resCompAccountingType.description: Information regarding comp accounting on the reservation.

compType.description: Code used to identify the casino comp type and ranking of a guest.

authorizer.description: ID of the employee who will act as the host for this guest.

compPostings.description: Indicates if the Comp Billing/posting Exist

authorizerInfo.description: The authorizer information for Promotion Code with attached Complimentary Routing

beginDate.description: Begin Date for attached Routing Instruction.

endDate.description: End Date for attached Routing Instruction.

authorizerUserName.description: Application user name of the authorizer

inheritAuthorizerRateCode.description: Indicates whether user has the choice to have reservation inherit rate code from the authorizer.

taxTypeType.description: Provides information about the Tax Type.

hasPaid.description: Resolves whether reservation has paid deposit.

hasOutstanding.description: Resolves whether reservation has outstanding deposit.

reservationAllowedActionType.description: Flag indicating whether the Enrollment is in progress or not for the Profile associated with this Reservation.

keyReady.description: Denotes the status of Key Ready message. It can have one of the values:PENDING, COMPLETED or FAILED
