hotelReservationsType.description: A collection of Reservation objects and Unique IDs of Reservation.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

hotelReservationType.description: The Reservation class contains the current reservation being created or altered.

reservationIdList.description: Used to provide PMS and/or CRS identifiers.

externalReferences.description: External Reference information for Reservation. Please note, for id and idContext elements within externalReferences for the reservation the following maximum character limits are applicable: 50 maximum characters for id and 20 maximum characters for idContext.

sourceOfSale.description: Point of Sale of reservation. Identifies the entity/channel who made the reservation.

reservationGuests.description: Collection of guests associated with the reservation.

sharedGuests.description: Collection of guests who share this reservation.

additionalGuestInfo.description: Entry Date into the country. (Croatian Requirements).

reservationProfiles.description: Collection of guests associated with the reservation.

commissionPayoutTo.description: If not null, reservation is considered to pay out commission to either Travel Agent, Source or both.

trackItItems.description: Collection of TrackIt Items available for that reservation

locators.description: Collection of Locators available for that reservation

attachments.description: Collection of attachments available for that reservation

webRegistrationCards.description: Collection of Web Registration Cards available for that reservation

serviceRequests.description: Collection of Service Requests available for that reservation

reservationActivities.description: Collection of Reservation Activities available for that reservation

scheduledActivities.description: Collection of Scheduled Activities available for that reservation

prepaidCards.description: Collection of Prepaid Cards available for that reservation

profileAwards.description: Collection of profile awards available for that reservation

reservationPackages.description: A Service object represents a non-room product provided to guests. Service products may have associated inventory and charges.

inventoryItems.description: A collection of inventory items attached to a reservation.

comments.description: List of Notes for the Guest related to the reservation.

guestComments.description: List of Notes for the Guest related to the profile.

guestMemberships.description: List of Memberships for the Guest related to the reservation.

reservationPaymentMethods.description: A collection of Payment Method objects.

reservationPolicies.description: A collection of Cancellation Penalties objects.

cashiering.description: Holds cashiering related information for the reservation.

linkedReservation.description: Reservations related to the current Reservation.

reservationIndicators.description: Indicators of additional information attached to the reservation

waitlist.description: Information regarding why reservation has been/was waitlisted. This could hold information as history even if reservation is no more in Waitlist status.

cancellation.description: Information regarding why reservation has been/was cancelled. This could hold information as history even if reservation is no more in in Cancelled status.

cancellationNo.description: Cancellation Number given when reservation was last cancelled.

date.description: Date when reservation was last cancelled.

catering.description: Catering event information if reservation is associated with the catering event.

lockHandle.description: An id representing the record lock for this reservation. When passed, update operation will verify that this lock is still valid.

overrideInstructions.description: List of overrides done for the reservation.

queue.description: Information about the time and duration this reservation was on Queue for Checkin.

allowedActions.description: Collection of allowed actions for the reservation.

transactionDiversions.description: List of transaction diversions attached to the reservation.

advanceCheckIn.description: Information relating to Reservation's Advance Checked In state and Expected Time of Return

accessRestrictionMessage.description: Configurable Access Restriction Message for Excluded Block or Rate Code.

eCertificates.description: List of ECertificates attached to the reservation.

customNameValueDetail.description: List of Custom Name Value Information attached to the reservation.

customChargeExemptionDetails.description: List of Custom Charge Exemptions attached to the reservation.

folios.description: This element returns any automatically generated folios during check-in, based on the Fetch Instruction "AutoFolios". When the parameter "Auto Generate Credit Bill for Deposit upon Check In" is enabled, during check-in credit bills are automatically generated for the deposits. The generated credit bill details are returned so that user can preview/print the folio. For some countries like Portugal, it is mandatory to print the folio and hence this information is needed

autoBorrowFromHouse.description: This flag will force to borrow from house if borrow required for number of rooms requested, this will only applicable when reservation is attached to a Block.

overrideExternalChecks.description: Forcefully override the create/update action on the Reservation. For real-time CRS interfaces, this element is used as force selling indicator in case of Create or Update Reservation

roomStayReservation.description: Boolean True if this reservation is reserving rooms. False if it is only reserving services.

reservationStatus.description: Indicates the Actual status of the reservation.

computedReservationStatus.description: Indicates the Computed status of the reservation.

walkIn.description: When true, indicates the reservation is for a guest that walks-in without a reservation. When false, the reservation is not a walk-in.

printRate.description: Indicates whether to show the rate or not on a printed document which includes the rate.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee responsible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

purgeDate.description: Date an item will be purged from a database (e.g., from a live database to an archive).

createBusinessDate.description: Business Date when the reservation was created.

reinstateDate.description: Business Date when the reservation was last reinstated.

party.description: Party/PartyCode when reservation is part of a party(a small group).

primaryEnrollmentResort.description: Name Of the Resort/Hotel for the primary enrollment

primaryEnrollmentChain.description: Name of the Chain for the primary enrollment

displayColor.description: The color to display this reservation on room grid displays.

displayColorDetails.description: Information of reservation display color, determined based on OPERA parameter RESERVATION_COLOR_DEFINITION

markAsRecentlyAccessed.description: Mark this reservation as recently accessed.

overrideInventoryCheck.description: Indicates to Override the Room Inventory Check if applicable.

accessRestriction.description: Indicates user restriction on the reservation based on the Access exclusion functionality such as Restriction on Changes, Cancellation or both.

upgradeEligible.description: Indicates whether the reservation is eligible for upgrade.

allowMobileCheckout.description: Flag containing true or false value for reservation to be eligible for self-checkout by guest using mobile device . Pass the 'true' or 'false' values when creating / modifying reservation to indicate whether a reservation is eligible for mobile checkout yes / no. Upon fetch, the current state of the flag will show true or false.

allowMobileViewFolio.description: Attribute AllowMobileViewFolio is set to true when the reservation is eligible for viewing folio using mobile device.

allowPreRegistration.description: Flag containing true or false value for reservation to be eligible for prior check in by guest using mobile device . Pass the 'true' or 'false' values when creating / modifying reservation to indicate whether a reservation is eligible for mobile check in yes / no. Upon fetch, the current state of the flag will show true or false.

optedForCommunication.description: Flag containing true or false value to determine if the guest has opted for communications pertaining to this reservation.Pass the 'true' or 'false' values when creating / modifying reservation to indicate whether a reservation is marked for communication. Upon fetch, the current state of the flag will show true or false.

chargeCardNumber.description: This attribute represents Hotel charge card number. This number is generated automatically in OPERA when a reservation is created in OPERA. It is part of a functionality that provide the guest with the convenience of placing all their charges directly on their reservation folio.

overrideOutOfServiceCheck.description: Indicates to Override the Room Out Of Service Check if applicable.

overrideRotationRoom.description: Override the rotation room that is next in the sequence with the room currently assigned to this reservation. This is applicable when Room Rotation OPERA Control is active.

overrideRoomOwnership.description: Override the room ownership of the room currently assigned to this reservation. This is applicable when Room Rotation OPERA Control is active.

reservationMembershipAwards.description: Collection of membership awards attached to a reservation

overrideRoomFeatures.description: This flag indicates true/false. When this is true, it will allow to override the room feature preference validation while assigning rooms. The Reservation Room Features OPERA Control will determine which room feature preferences will be validated. When Reservation Room Features is on, the validation will be against the Room Feature preferences attached to the reservation. If the parameter is off, the validation will be against the room feature preferences attached to the profile. This is applicable when the Room Feature Validation OPERA Control is on.

backToBack.description: This attribute indicates if the linked reservation is marked as Back to Back or not.

backToBackSequence.description: This attribute represents Back To Back Sequence of Linked Reservations(e.g. '1 of 2' i.e, 1 indicates Sequence Position of total count 2). This is applicable when OPERA control Back to Back Handling for Linked Reservations is active.

payeeSharer.description: This attribute indicates if the Shared reservation is marked as the Payee Sharer or not.

routeAllTransactionsToShare.description: Indicates if this joining reservation should route all transactions to the 'Share To' reservation when including Share Reservations Instructions.

backToBackGroupId.description: This attribute represents a common identifier for a subgroup of linked reservations marked as Back to Back in a group of linked reservations.

overrideSharesStayingPastDepartureCheck.description: Indicates to override the check on shared reservations to whom changes can be propagated until their departure date.

trxCodesInfo.description: Summary of Transaction codes information which are related to reservation.

checkInInitiatedBy.description: This indicates who initiated the Check In/Advance Check In.Advance Check In functionality is available when the Advance Check In OPERA Control is active.

registrationNumber.description: Registration Number of the reservation for the current day.

currentRoomInfo.description: Room information of the reservation for the current day.

roomRates.description: A collection of Room Rates associated with a particular Room Stay. Each Room Rate combination can have multiple rates. Example King room, Rack rate plan, Monday through Thursday, weekday amount, Friday and Saturday, weekend amount.

bookingTimeSpan.description: The booking time span of the reservation, only applicable when time increments are being used.

reservationKeyInfo.description: Holds the room key information provided by the Door Lock System.

expectedTimes.description: The Expected Arrival and Departure Times.

originalTimeSpan.description: The Original Time Span(Arrival, Departure) which covers the Room Stay. In case of Rolling No Show TimeSpan's StratDate moves forward but OriginalTimeSpan's StratDate remains the same.

guarantee.description: The guarantee information associated to the Room Stay. A maximum of 5 occurances are available for use depending on the context.

promotion.description: Promotions applied to the reservation to get the promotional rate.

total.description: The total amount charged for the Room Stay.

totalPoints.description: The total number of Points charged for the Room Stay.

multiValueAttrs.description: Informative indicators indicating different values of an attribute exists over the stay.

upsellInfo.description: Indicates Upsell Information to be applied on Reservation.

mobileNotifications.description: Denotes the status of Room Ready and Key Ready messages.

roomNumberLocked.description: When true, indicates a room number cannot be changed. When false, indicates a room number may be changed.

printRate.description: This control whether rate info will be printed in confirmation letter.

primaryShareType.description: This is populated in case of primary share scenario. This indicates whether this reservation is primary or non primary. Changes or postings to the 'non-primary' share reservation is not allowed.

remoteCheckInAllowed.description: Indicates whether the reservation is pre-registered for internet check-in or not.

bookingMedium.description: Classifies the medium(Channel field on reservation screen) through which the reservation is made.

availableUpsellOfferCount.description: Number of Upsell Offers Available for this stay. This will only be populated if the Upsell Instruction is included in the Allowed Instruction request

currentRoomInfoType.description: Room information of the reservation for the current day.

roomOwnershipType.description: Provides the information of the assigned reservation room is an Owner/Referral or Regular room.This value is returned when Room Rotation OPERA Control is active and room number is assigned to a reservation.

roomViewCode.description: Represents the room view code like City view, River view, Ocean view etc.

assignedByAI.description: Represents the room was assigned by AI Room Assignment.

upgradedByAI.description: Represents the room was upgraded by AI Room Assignment.

reservationRoomOwnershipType.description: Indicates if the assigned reservation room is an Owner/Referral or Regular room.

stayProfiles.description: Profile associated with the room Stay.

guestCounts.description: A collection of Guest Counts associated with the room rate.

taxFreeGuestCounts.description: A collection of Tax Free Guest Counts associated with the room rate. This list does not add to the guest count but just indicates number of tax free guests out of guest counts.

awards.description: Membership Awards code applied on the reservation.

reservationBlock.description: Key information about the block for this reservation.

roomRateInfo.description: Information about the Room Rate Combination.

eligibilityCode.description: Used by 3rd party CRS, the Eligible Reservation Code defines if this day/rate is eligible for points in the Loyalty System.

awardCode.description: Used by 3rd party CRS, the Award Code defines if this day/rate was booked as an Award in the Loyalty System.

awardNumber.description: Used by 3rd party CRS, the Award Number defines if this day/rate was booked as an Award in the Loyalty System.

ownerUseRateCode.description: Indicates if the rate code is restricted for use by Owner Reservations.

ownerReferralRateCode.description: Indicates if the rate code is restricted for use by Owner Referral Reservations

start.description: The starting value of the date range.

end.description: The ending value of the date range.

rateIncludesTax.description: Indicates if the calculated amount for the day is inclusive of tax.

marketCode.description: The code that relates to the market being sold to (e.g., the corporate market, packages).

sourceCode.description: To specify where the business came from e.g. radio, newspaper ad, etc.

sourceCodeDescription.description: Description of the source of business.

roomId.description: A string value representing the unique identification of a room.

pseudoRoom.description: True indicates as pseudo room type. This is usually used for a posting master reservation.

roomTypeCharged.description: Room Type used for the Rate calculation.

commissionCode.description: Commission Code applicable for commission calculation for Travel Agent/Company.

commissionable.description: Indicates Commission is applicable for commission calculation for Travel Agent/Company.

houseUseOnly.description: Indicates this reservation is for House use.

complimentary.description: Indicates this reservation rate is complimentary.

inventoryLender.description: Indicates whether the room type inventory was taken from the allotment or House availability.

rateGroup.description: For RatePlanSet equals BESTAVAILABLERATE, in case Rate Groups are enabled the element provides the rate group for the rate plan code.

discountAllowed.description: Indicates if the Rate Code is discountable i.e discounts are allowed on the rate code.

bogoDiscount.description: Indicates if the Rate Code has BOGO(Bye one Get one) indicator.

rateLevel.description: Rate plan type like Corporate,Regular,Military,Weekend etc.

commissionPercentage.description: Indicates commission percentage used by the rate plan.

commissionAmount.description: Indicates commission amount used by the rate plan.

taxIncluded.description: If true, indicates if tax is included in the rate code.

allowAutoCheckIn.description: It represents whether auto check-in is enabled or not for psuedo room types.

bookingMedium.description: Classifies the medium(Channel field on reservation screen) through which the reservation is made.

roomNumberLocked.description: This attribute is to verify if the move in room number is locked. When true the move in room number cannot be changed. Locking a room number is available when the Do Not Move OPERA Control is active.

scheduledMoveStatus.description: Scheduled room move status for the room segment of the reservation. Scheduled Room Move functionality is available when the Advance Daily Detail OPERA Control is active.

totalType.description: The total amount charged for the service including additional amounts and fees.

amountBeforeTax.description: The total amount not including any exclusive associated tax ( e.g., sales tax, VT, GST, or any associated tax configured as an exclusive generate ). Taxes marked as Tax Inclusive are included in this amount.

amountBeforeAnyTax.description: The total amount per room does not include any associated tax (e.g., sales tax, VAT, GST or any associated tax), for both Tax Exclusive/Inclusive.

amountAfterTax.description: The total amount including all associated taxes (e.g., sales tax, VAT, GST or any associated tax).

currencyCode.description: The code specifying a monetary unit. Use ISO 4217, three alpha code.

currencySymbol.description: The symbol for the currency, e.g, for currencyCode USD the symbol is $.

decimalPlaces.description: Indicates the number of decimal places for a particular currency. This is equivalent to the ISO 4217 standard "minor unit". Typically used when the amount provided includes the minor unit of currency without a decimal point (e.g., USD 8500 needs DecimalPlaces="2" to represent $85).

rateOverride.description: When true indicates that the rate amount has been overridden.

baseAmount.description: The rate's base price. Amount excluding price for any add to rate combine line package attached to the rate.Also excludes any discounts

amountBeforeTaxPerRoom.description: The total amount per room not including any associated tax (e.g., sales tax, VAT, GST or any associated tax).

amountAfterTaxPerRoom.description: The total amount per room including all associated taxes (e.g., sales tax, VAT, GST or any associated tax).

totalTax.description: A sum of the taxes which are related to Rate Info.

currencyCode.description: Provides a currency code to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.

taxType.description: Applicable tax element. This element allows for both percentages and flat amounts. If one field is used, the other should be zero since logically, taxes should be calculated in only one of the two ways.

type.description: Used to indicate if the amount is inclusive or exclusive of other charges, such as taxes, or is cumulative (amounts have been added to each other).

code.description: Code identifying the fee (e.g.,agency fee, municipality fee).

generateTransactionCode.description: Unique identifier for Generate Tax Transaction code.

currencyCode.description: Provides a currency code to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.

amountDeterminationType.description: Used to indicate if an amount is inclusive or exclusive of other charges, such as taxes.

rate.description: The Rate contains a collection of elements that define the amount of the rate, associated fees, additional occupant amounts. Taxes can be broken out or included within the various amounts. A currency can be associated to each amount.

amountType.description: Base charge and additional charges related to a room that includes such things as additional guest amounts, cancel fees, etc. Also includes Discount percentages, total amount, and the rate description.

base.description: The base amount charged for the accommodation or service per unit of time (ex: Nightly, Weekly, etc). If TaxInclusive is set to True, then taxes are included in the base amount. Note that any additional charges should itemized in the other elements.

discount.description: Discount percentage and/or Amount, code and textual reason for discount

shareRatePercentage.description: Indicates the share rate percentage for the reservation if set to CUSTOMSPLIT.

shareDistributionInstruction.description: Last rate share distribution instruction applied on share reservation daily rate segment.

total.description: The total amount charged for this rate including additional occupant amounts and fees.

requiredPoints.description: The Points contains the number of points required to book a particular room type.

effectiveRate.description: The reservation effective amount charged for the accommodation or service (i.e. base amount + amount for Add to Rate Combine Line packages) per unit of time

start.description: The starting value of the date range.

end.description: The ending value of the date range.

discountType.description: Identifies and provides details about the discount. This allows for both percentages and flat amounts. If one field is used, the other should be zero/not specified since logically.

currencyCode.description: Provides a currency code to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.

discountCode.description: Specifies the type of discount (e.g., No condition, LOS, Deposit or Total amount spent).

shareDistributionInstructionType.description: The type of Rate Amount Change to be done on the Sharer reservation. This can be FULL -> Full Rate for each Sharer. SPLIT-> Split the Rate amount between Sharer Reservations. ENTIRE -> This Sharer will get the total amount of the rate code for all the Sharer Reservations.

profileIdList.description: Unique identifiers for the Profile for both internal and external systems. In case of Travel Agent the IATA code and in case of Company can be any form of identifier as id.

profile.description: Provides detailed information regarding either a company or a customer profile.

externalReferences.description: External References information for this Profile. Will be returned in getReservation and getReservationByExtId calls when the 'profileExternalReferencesToFetch' query parameter is sent.

profileType.description: Type provides the detailed information about the profile and its children.

customer.description: Detailed customer information for this profile.

company.description: Detailed company information for this profile.

addressInfo.description: Collection of Detailed information on an address for the customer.

traceCode.description: Trace Code associated to the profile.

ownerCode.description: Owner Code associated to the profile.

telephoneInfo.description: Collection of Detailed information on telephone/fax for the customer.

emails.description: List of email address for the customer.

emailInfo.description: Collection of Detailed information on an eMail address for the customer.

uRLs.description: List of Information on a URL for the customer.

uRLInfo.description: Collection of Detailed information on web url/address for the customer.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

comments.description: List of Notes for the customer.

commentInfo.description: Collection of Detailed information on comments for the customer.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

profileDeliveryMethods.description: List of Delivery methods configured against a Property for this Profile.

profileDeliveryMethod.description: Collection of delivery methods for this Profile.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

profileMemberships.description: List of loyalty program(s) the profile is subscribed to.

profileMembership.description: Collection of Detailed information on memberships for the customer.

preferenceType.description: Collection of Detailed information on preferences of the customer.

relationships.description: Contains a collection of profiles that have a relationship with this profile.

relationship.description: A collection of the profiles that have a relationship with this profile.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

relationshipsSummary.description: Contains a collection of profiles that have a relationship with this profile.

relationship.description: A collection of the profiles summary that have a relationship with this profile.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

reservationInfoList.description: Collection of Detailed information on history and future reservations associated with the profile.

stayReservationInfoList.description: Collection of Detailed information on history and future reservations associated with the profile.

lastStayInfo.description: Information on last stay of the profile.

profileRestrictions.description: Detailed information on restrictions associated with the profile.

cashiering.description: Contains cashiering related details for the profile

commissionInfoList.description: Contains commission related details for the profile.

roomOwnershipInfo.description: Collection of Detailed information on Room Ownership records.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

profileType.description: Type of profile such as Guest, Agent, Company, Group, Source, Employee, Hotel, Vendor or Contact.

registeredProperty.description: Hotel which this profile is registered with. This attribute is not used for configuration.

requestForHotel.description: Hotel which this profile is to be registered. This attribute is only used during creation of profile.

protectedBy.description: What level this profile is protected.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee responsible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

markAsRecentlyAccessed.description: Mark this profile as recently accessed.

markForHistory.description: "true" setting marks the profile to be kept from being purged, once the profile is marked inactive.

hasCommission.description: Populates true if the profile has commission configured false otherwise.

showInactiveRoomOwners.description: Flag to show inactive Room Owners.

guestAge.description: Age of a guest in years.

customerType.description: Contains basic data on the customer's identity, location, relationships, finances, memberships, etc.

personName.description: Detailed name information for the customer.

anonymization.description: Provides information about the guest's anonymization status

identifications.description: List of identification of the customer.

identificationInfo.description: Collection of detailed information on the identification of the customer.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

gender.description: Identifies the profile gender code selected from Gender types List of values. Gender types LOV provides the values configured at gender configuration.

birthDate.description: Indicates the date of birth as indicated in the document, in ISO 8601 prescribed format.

birthDateMasked.description: Indicates the date of birth as masked.

customerValue.description: The supplier's ranking of the customer (e.g., VIP, numerical ranking).

privateProfile.description: This element tells profile is property exclusive or not.

blacklist.description: This element tells if profile is blacklisted or not.

personNameType.description: This provides name information for a person.

namePrefix.description: Salutation of honorific (e.g. Mr., Mrs., Ms., Miss, Dr.)

givenName.description: Given name, first name or names.

middleName.description: The middle name of the person name.

surname.description: Family name, last name. May also be used for full name if the sending system does not have the ability to separate a full name into its parts, e.g. the surname element may be used to pass the full name.

nameType.description: Type of name of the individual, such as former, nickname, alternate or alias name.

personNameTypeType.description: Person's name in an external system.

identificationInfoType.description: Information on the identification of the customer.

identification.description: Detailed information on the identification of the customer.

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

idType.description: Identification Type. Eg Passport, Driving License etc.

issuedCountry.description: The country where Identification was issued.

issuedPlace.description: The place where Identification was issued.

registeredProperty.description: Property where the identification belongs to.

primaryInd.description: When true, indicates a primary information.

alternateName.description: Alternate Name of the Company. Mainly, it's the name of the company written in the Alternate Language.

currencyCode.description: The code specifying a monetary unit. Use ISO 4217, three alpha code.

currencySymbol.description: The symbol for the currency, e.g, for currencyCode USD the symbol is $.

decimalPlaces.description: Indicates the number of decimal places for a particular currency. This is equivalent to the ISO 4217 standard "minor unit". Typically used when the amount provided includes the minor unit of currency without a decimal point (e.g., USD 8500 needs DecimalPlaces="2" to represent $85).

blacklist.description: This element tells if profile is blacklisted or not.

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

isValidated.description: Indicator to define if the Address is validated by the Address Validation System.

addressLine.description: When the address is unformatted (FormattedInd="false") these lines will contain free form address details. When the address is formatted and street number and street name must be sent independently, the street number will be sent using StreetNmbr, and the street name will be sent in the first AddressLine occurrence.

cityName.description: City (e.g., Dublin), town, or postal station (i.e., a postal service territory, often used in a military address).

cityExtension.description: Post Office City Extension Code number. City Extension mainly used for UK addresses.

county.description: County or District Name (e.g., Fairfax). This is read only.

type.description: Defines the type of address (e.g. home, business, other).

primaryInd.description: When true, indicates a primary information.

updateReservations.description: Indicates whether all future reservations for this profile should be updated with the primary address. When set to true, and the address is being updated to primary, any active reservations where this profile is the primary profile will automatically update to use the new primary address.

barCode.description: The postal barcode for the address.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee responsible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

uRLType.description: Web site address, in IETF(The Internet Engineering Task Force) specified format.

type.description: Defines the purpose of the URL address, such as personal, business, public, etc.

primaryInd.description: When true, indicates a primary information.

comment.description: Comment details for the comment. It will be empty in case of delete comment.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee responsible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

purgeDate.description: Date an item will be purged from a database (e.g., from a live database to an archive).

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

commentType.description: An indication of a new paragraph for a sub-section of a formatted text message.

notificationLocation.description: Notification Location associated with the Note.

type.description: Specifies type of the comment.

internal.description: When true, the comment may not be shown to the consumer. When false, the comment may be shown to the consumer.

confidential.description: When true, the comment may be confidential.

overrideInternal.description: When true, the note internal could be modified.

hotelId.description: If specified comment belongs to the Hotel, otherwise it is a global comment.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee responsible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

formattedTextTextType.description: Provides text and indicates whether it is formatted or not.

profileDeliveryMethod.description: Delivery Information type to the profile.

deliveryId.description: Delivery ID. It will be empty in case of new delivery method.

deliveryType.description: Delivery type can have a value EMAIL, ELECTRONIC etc and it depends on the parameter set in OPERA Control.

deliveryValue.description: Delivery value holds the corresponding value of the delivery type..

hotelId.description: Property that has delivery methods configured.

deliveryModule.description: Module where this delivery type will be used. Example : EFolio Export, EInvoice , Fiscal, etc..

primaryInd.description: When true, indicates a primary information.

profileDeliveryModuleType.description: Module where this delivery type will be used. Example : EFolio Export, EInvoice , Fiscal, etc..

priceCalculationRule.description: The price calculation rule for this package.

calculatedPrice.description: Calculated Package Price based from Number of Adults, Children and Calculation Rule.

everyXNightsStartingNightY.description: Post the package every X nights Staring from Night Y.

startOnNightY.description: Starting night for consumption and posting prices.

postEveryXNights.description: Occurance of nights when the package needs to be posted and consumed.

certainNightsOfTheWeek.description: Post the package on certain nights of the week.

customStaySchedule.description: This user defined schedule lets you enter a posting rhythm over a 14-day period, starting with the arrival date, by assigning the day (number) within a guest stay for posting this package price.

customNightSchedule.description: The start and end of the posting period is determined as follows: If the package is attached to a rate code: The period starts with the date when the rate code to which the package is attached becomes effective for the stay. The period ends with the date of the last night for that rate code (or the last night of the stay if the rate code remains in effect until the departure date). If the package is attached separately to the reservation: The Begin Date specified on the reservation when the package was attached is the start date for the period. The End Date specified on the reservation when the package was attached is the end date for the period. If no Begin Date and/or End Date are specified when the package is attached to the reservation, the Begin Date is assumed to be the arrival date and the End Date is assumed to be the departure date of the reservation, irrespective of when the package is attached to the reservation.

type.description: Posting Rhythm for the package.

postingRhythmType.description: Simple type for posting Rhythm types.

packageCalculationRuleType.description: Simple type for package caluculation rules.

articleNumber.description: Article Number of the inventory item.

quantity.description: Quantity of the inventory item allocated to the package.

consumptionDate.description: The date the package was used or can be used.

unitPrice.description: The price per unit of the package.

totalQuantity.description: The total quantity of the package for this date, calculated based on the calculation rule as defined in the PackageHeaderType

computedResvPrice.description: Computed Reservation Price of the package. Calculation Will Be Performed Based On Other Parameters.

unitAllowance.description: The allowance per unit of the package.

reservationDate.description: The date of the Reservation when this package is applicable. This can be different from the date the package will be consumed. Example are next day packages. Reservation date is when the package is applied to the guest and Consumption date is when the guest can consume the package.

originalUnitPrice.description: The original price per unit of the package if it has been changed.

originalUnitAllowance.description: The original allowance per unit of the package if it has been changed.

excludedQuantity.description: The quantity which has been excluded in the package.

folios.description: This element returns any automatically generated folios during check-in, based on the Fetch Instruction "AutoFolios". When the parameter "Auto Generate Credit Bill for Deposit upon Check In" is enabled, during check-in credit bills are automatically generated for the deposits. The generated credit bill details are returned so that user can preview/print the folio. For some countries like Portugal, it is mandatory to print the folio and hence this information is needed

autoBorrowFromHouse.description: This flag will force to borrow from house if borrow required for number of rooms requested, this will only applicable when reservation is attached to a Block.

overrideExternalChecks.description: Forcefully override the create/update action on the Reservation. For real-time CRS interfaces, this element is used as force selling indicator in case of Create or Update Reservation

roomStayReservation.description: Boolean True if this reservation is reserving rooms. False if it is only reserving services.

computedReservationStatus.description: Indicates the Computed status of the reservation.

walkIn.description: When true, indicates the reservation is for a guest that walks-in without a reservation. When false, the reservation is not a walk-in.

printRate.description: Indicates whether to show the rate or not on a printed document which includes the rate.

upgradeEligible.description: Indicates whether the reservation is eligible for upgrade.

allowMobileCheckout.description: Flag containing true or false value for reservation to be eligible for self-checkout by guest using mobile device . Pass the 'true' or 'false' values when creating / modifying reservation to indicate whether a reservation is eligible for mobile checkout yes / no. Upon fetch, the current state of the flag will show true or false.

allowMobileViewFolio.description: Attribute AllowMobileViewFolio is set to true when the reservation is eligible for viewing folio using mobile device.

allowPreRegistration.description: Flag containing true or false value for reservation to be eligible for prior check in by guest using mobile device . Pass the 'true' or 'false' values when creating / modifying reservation to indicate whether a reservation is eligible for mobile check in yes / no. Upon fetch, the current state of the flag will show true or false.

optedForCommunication.description: Flag containing true or false value to determine if the guest has opted for communications pertaining to this reservation.Pass the 'true' or 'false' values when creating / modifying reservation to indicate whether a reservation is marked for communication. Upon fetch, the current state of the flag will show true or false.

chargeCardNumber.description: This attribute represents Hotel charge card number. This number is generated automatically in OPERA when a reservation is created in OPERA. It is part of a functionality that provide the guest with the convenience of placing all their charges directly on their reservation folio.

overrideOutOfServiceCheck.description: Indicates to Override the Room Out Of Service Check if applicable.

overrideRotationRoom.description: Override the rotation room that is next in the sequence with the room currently assigned to this reservation. This is applicable when Room Rotation OPERA Control is active.

overrideRoomOwnership.description: Override the room ownership of the room currently assigned to this reservation. This is applicable when Room Rotation OPERA Control is active.

responseInstructions.description: Collection of instructions to be returned as a set of reservation information.

confirmationOnly.description: If this value is set to TRUE, then the operation will only return for a Success or Failed flag.

changeInstrunctions.description: Collection of instructions for changing the reservation.

overrideRoomFeatures.description: This flag indicates true/false. When this is true, it will allow to override the room feature preference validation while assigning rooms. The Reservation Room Features OPERA Control will determine which room feature preferences will be validated. When Reservation Room Features is on, the validation will be against the Room Feature preferences attached to the reservation. If the parameter is off, the validation will be against the room feature preferences attached to the profile. This is applicable when the Room Feature Validation OPERA Control is on.

routeAllTransactionsToShare.description: Indicates if this joining reservation should route all transactions to the 'Share To' reservation when including Share Reservations Instructions.

externalDailyRates.description: Collection of room rate information provided by an external application on a daily basis to be applied to share reservation based on the share rate distribution method. To be used when OPERA Control parameter 'External Availability, Rates and Inventory' is active.

When false or omitted the chosen changes are applied only to overlapping dates of share reservations.

deltaUpdateOnAccompanyingGuests.description: When true, changes to accompanying guests are performed following an incremental update approach instead of a full overlay.

idContext.description: Used to identify the source of the identifier (e.g., IATA, ABTA).

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee responsible for the creation.

Typically used when the amount provided includes the minor unit of currency without a decimal point (e.g., USD 8500 needs DecimalPlaces="2" to represent $85).

guestComments.description: List of Notes for the Guest related to the profile.

guestMemberships.description: List of Memberships for the Guest related to the reservation.

reservationPaymentMethods.description: A collection of Payment Method objects.

reservationPolicies.description: A collection of Cancellation Penalties objects.

cashiering.description: Holds cashiering related information for the reservation.

linkedReservation.description: Reservations related to the current Reservation.

reservationIndicators.description: Indicators of additional information attached to the reservation

waitlist.description: Information regarding why reservation has been/was waitlisted. This could hold information as history even if reservation is no more in Waitlist status.

cancellation.description: Information regarding why reservation has been/was cancelled. This could hold information as history even if reservation is no more in in Cancelled status.

cancellationNo.description: Cancellation Number given when reservation was last cancelled.

date.description: Date when reservation was last cancelled.

catering.description: Catering event information if reservation is associated with the catering event.

statisticalClassification.description: Catering event information if reservation is associated with the catering event.

lockHandle.description: An id representing the record lock for this reservation. When passed, update operation will verify that this lock is still valid.

overrideInstructions.description: List of overrides done for the reservation.

queue.description: Information about the time and duration this reservation was on Queue for Checkin.

allowedActions.description: Collection of allowed actions for the reservation.

transactionDiversions.description: List of transaction diversions attached to the reservation.

advanceCheckIn.description: Information relating to Reservation's Advance Checked In state and Expected Time of Return

accessRestrictionMessage.description: Configurable Access Restriction Message for Excluded Block or Rate Code.

eCertificates.description: List of ECertificates attached to the reservation.

customNameValueDetail.description: List of Custom Name Value Information attached to the reservation.

customChargeExemptionDetails.description: List of Custom Charge Exemptions attached to the reservation.

folios.description: This element returns any automatically generated folios during check-in, based on the Fetch Instruction "AutoFolios". When the parameter "Auto Generate Credit Bill for Deposit upon Check In" is enabled, during check-in credit bills are automatically generated for the deposits. The generated credit bill details are returned so that user can preview/print the folio. For some countries like Portugal, it is mandatory to print the folio and hence this information is needed

autoBorrowFromHouse.description: This flag will force to borrow from house if borrow required for number of rooms requested, this will only applicable when reservation is attached to a Block.

overrideExternalChecks.description: Forcefully override the create/update action on the Reservation. For real-time CRS interfaces, this element is used as force selling indicator in case of Create or Update Reservation

roomStayReservation.description: Boolean True if this reservation is reserving rooms. False if it is only reserving services.

reservationStatus.description: Indicates the Actual status of the reservation.

computedReservationStatus.description: Indicates the Computed status of the reservation.

walkIn.description: When true, indicates the reservation is for a guest that walks-in without a reservation. When false, the reservation is not a walk-in.

printRate.description: Indicates whether to show the rate or not on a printed document which includes the rate.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee responsible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

purgeDate.description: Date an item will be purged from a database (e.g., from a live database to an archive).

createBusinessDate.description: Business Date when the reservation was created.

reinstateDate.description: Business Date when the reservation was last reinstated.

party.description: Party/PartyCode when reservation is part of a party(a small group).

primaryEnrollmentResort.description: Name Of the Resort/Hotel for the primary enrollment

primaryEnrollmentChain.description: Name of the Chain for the primary enrollment

displayColor.description: The color to display this reservation on room grid displays.

markAsRecentlyAccessed.description: Mark this reservation as recently accessed.

overrideInventoryCheck.description: Indicates to Override the Room Inventory Check if applicable.

accessRestriction.description: Indicates user restriction on the reservation based on the Access exclusion functionality such as Restriction on Changes, Cancellation or both.

upgradeEligible.description: Indicates whether the reservation is eligible for upgrade.

allowMobileCheckout.description: Flag containing true or false value for reservation to be eligible for self-checkout by guest using mobile device . Pass the 'true' or 'false' values when creating / modifying reservation to indicate whether a reservation is eligible for mobile checkout yes / no. Upon fetch, the current state of the flag will show true or false.

allowMobileViewFolio.description: Attribute AllowMobileViewFolio is set to true when the reservation is eligible for viewing folio using mobile device.

allowPreRegistration.description: Flag containing true or false value for reservation to be eligible for prior check in by guest using mobile device . Pass the 'true' or 'false' values when creating / modifying reservation to indicate whether a reservation is eligible for mobile check in yes / no. Upon fetch, the current state of the flag will show true or false.

optedForCommunication.description: Flag containing true or false value to determine if the guest has opted for communications pertaining to this reservation.Pass the 'true' or 'false' values when creating / modifying reservation to indicate whether a reservation is marked for communication. Upon fetch, the current state of the flag will show true or false.

chargeCardNumber.description: This attribute represents Hotel charge card number. This number is generated automatically in OPERA when a reservation is created in OPERA. It is part of a functionality that provide the guest with the convenience of placing all their charges directly on their reservation folio.

overrideOutOfServiceCheck.description: Indicates to Override the Room Out Of Service Check if applicable.

linkedReservationList.description: Set of reservations linked to the requested Reservation.

reservationLock.description: Operation for requesting a lock on a reservation.

reservationId.description: The id of the reservation we are requesting a lock for.

overrideIfLockedByRequestingUser.description: If true, the operation will try to break the existing lock if the requesting user is the same as the owner of the lock.

lockHandle.description: An identifier representing the record lock for the reservation under process.When passed,then it will verify that if the lock is still valid and return same lock handle.Else it will create new lock.

reservationLockDetails.description: This response will indicate whether the requested lock has been granted or some other user owns the lock.

acquiredReservationLock.description: This contains the lock information for the reservation.

existingReservationLock.description: This will contain information about the reservation lock that is currently held by another user. Lock handle will be null.

masterAccount.description: Details of the posting master reservation to be created.

masterAccountType.description: Details of the posting master reservation.

reservationIdList.description: Indicates OPERA and/or external identifiers.

timeSpan.description: Dates indicating the duration of the account.

reservationBlock.description: Information of the block associated with the reservation.

blockIdList.description: Unique ID of the business block to which this reservation will be associated.

roomRate.description: Posting master reservation room and rate information.

ratePlanCode.description: The Rate Code of the reservation.

reservationProfiles.description: Collection of non-guest profiles associated with the reservation.

comments.description: List of Notes for the Guest related to the reservation.

reservationPaymentMethods.description: A collection of Payment Method objects.

cashiering.description: Holds cashiering related information for the reservation.

reservationStatus.description: Indicates the Actual status of the reservation.

masterAccount.description: Summary information of the changed posting master reservation that can be used to identify it uniquely.

masterAccountSummaryType.description: Minimal information of the posting master reservation that can be used to identify the reservation uniquely.

reservationIdList.description: Indicates PMS and/or CRS identifiers of active and cancelled reservations.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee responsible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

purgeDate.description: Date an item will be purged from a database (e.g., from a live database to an archive).

createBusinessDate.description: Business Date when the reservation was created.

fromReservationID.description: Unique identifier of the reservation to be merged with.

moveReservationHotel.description: Request for moving a reservation and its valid sharers to a different hotel.

sourceHotelCode.description: Hotel code for the current reservation being moved.

destinationHotelCode.description: Hotel code for the hotel which the reservation will be moved.

reservationId.description: Main identifier of the reservation being moved based on the SourceHotel.

configuredReservation.description: This reservation object will be the configured/reconfigured reservation which will be generated on the DestinationHotel.

includedSharers.description: Valid share reservation identifier. This ID will be verified against the SourceHotel.

retainRateCodeAndAmount.description: If true, it indicates that rate codes and amounts for different days of the source reservation will be moved to target reservation. When false or null that means available rate codes from target property is used and will be part of REST request already.

moveReservationHotelDetails.description: This API will potentially remove the following information to a moved reservation: - Routing Instructions - All routing information will have to be configured in the new hotel. - Packages - All packages will need to be re-configured, if it exist, in the new hotel. - Imperfect Share - An imperfect share was requested to be moved and has been ignored.

reservation.description: Reservation response will be returned in the case of a successful move - ConfirmationOnly flag in the criteria will be ignored.

packages.description: Response to fetch package availability with the data, success and warnings or errors.

reservationPackages.description: A collection of Service objects. This is the collection of all services associated with any part of this reservation (the reservation in its entirety, one or more guests, or one or more room stays). Which services are attributable to which part is determined by each object's ServiceRPHs collection.

reservationPackage.description: A Service object represents a package provided to guests. Service packages may have associated inventory and charges.

inventoryItems.description: A collection of items that are available and successfully held.

reservationPackagesInfo.description: Request method to attach a package to an existing reservation.

reservationId.description: The reservation id for which the package has to be changed.

reservationPackages.description: A Service object represents a package provided to guests. Service packages may have associated inventory and charges.

reservationPaymentMethods.description: Method to create a reservation's payment methods.

reservationId.description: Reservation Id for which the payment method is to be applied.

reservationPaymentMethods.description: List of payment methods which are to be attached to the reservation.

reservationPolicies.description: Response that contains deposit and cancellation policies attached with the reservation.

cancellationPolicies.description: Cancellation policies associated with a reservation.

depositPolicies.description: Deposit policies associated with a reservation.

preCheckInReservation.description: Request to pre-register a reservation eligible for pre-registration and change arrival details.

reservation.description: The reservation desired to change with its relevant pre-registration details.

allowMobileViewFolio.description: Attribute AllowMobileViewFolio is set to true when the reservation is eligible for viewing folio using mobile device.

reservationPreCheckInDetailsType.description: Type describing the different details regarding a pre-registered reservation including ID.

reservationId.description: The id of this reservation.

preCheckInDetails.description: The time at which the guest arrives at the hotel.

preCheckInDetailsType.description: Type describing the different details regarding a pre-registered reservation.

arrival.description: The time at which the guest arrives at the hotel.

roomId.description: Room Number to be assigned to the reservation.

allowMobileViewFolio.description: Attribute AllowMobileViewFolio is set to true when the reservation is eligible for viewing folio using mobile device.

reservationPaymentMethods.description: The payment methods of the reservation.

arrivalTransport.description: The arrival transportation details of the reservation.

reservationArrivalInfoType.description: Type describing information regarding the arrival of a reservation.

arrivalTime.description: The time at which the guest arrives at the hotel.

reservationPreferences.description: For reservation preferences, you will want to send ReservationPreferenceType as the preferenceType object to acknowledge any reservation related process with the request.

reservationPreferenceInfo.description: Method to change a reservation preference on an existing reservation.

reservationId.description: Reservation Id of the reservation for which the preference has to be changed.

reverseDepositPolicy.description: Request type to reverse deposit policy of a reservation.(This is applicable only when advance deposit handling is set to '17') ReverseDepositPolicy operation will reverse the policy by creating a new request with same opposite amount.

policy.description: Policy information used to reverse deposit policy of the reservation.

reservationReversePolicyCriteriaType.description: Reverse policy information of a reservation.

reservationId.description: Unique Id of the reservation.

policyId.description: Unique ID of the Reservation Policy.

routingInstructions.description: Response object containing routing instructions for a reservation.

changeShareRateAmount.description: Request to change the share amount for a sharer reservation. The amount change type can be Full, Entire or Split

criteria.description: Criteria for the Change Share Amount request.

externalDailyRates.description: Collection of room rate information provided by an external application on a daily basis to be applied to share reservation based on the share rate distribution method. To be used when OPERA Control parameter 'External Availability, Rates and Inventory' is active.

changeShareRateAmountType.description: Type for changing the Rate Amount of a Sharer.

hotelId.description: Opera Hotel/Resort code for the Change Share Amount request.

shareDistributionCriteria.description: Type Of Rate Change for the Sharer Reservation. Valid Types are Full, Entire and Zero.

changeShareRateInstructions.description: Instruction to apply new effective rates to the reservations.

effectiveRates.description: Instruction to apply new effective rates to the reservations.

returnShareReservations.description: After the change rate operation, return the new list of Sharer Reservaitions.

shareDistributionCriteria.description: Extended Reservation object to hold additional instructions along with the reservation. This should be used for updates on the reservation.

distributionType.description: Type Of Rate Change for the Sharer Reservation. Valid Types are Full, Entire and Zero.

shareReservations.description: Collection of instructions to be returned as a set of reservation information.

dailyRates.description: Collection of room rate information on a daily basis.

changeSharingGuests.description: Request to change Sharing Reservations Guest Counts(adults or children) information.

reservations.description: A collection of Sharing Reservations with the Guest Counts(adults or children) information that needs to be changed.

sharingGuestType.description: The Reservation class contains the current reservation with the guest counts(adults or children).

reservationId.description: The id of this reservation.

guestCounts.description: Holds the guest counts(adults or children) associated with this Reservation.

overlappingStay.description: Request to check for overlapping stays of reservations.

overlappingStayInfo.description: Overlapping stay information pertaining to the reservations to be checked.

overlappingStayInfoListType.description: Overlapping stay information of a reservation.

overlappingStayInfoType.description: Possible overlapping stay information of a reservation.

reservationId.description: Unique identifier of the reservation.

excludedReservations.description: List of unique reservation identifiers that should be excluded from the overlapping stay check.

start.description: The starting value of the date range.

end.description: The ending value of the date range.

overlappingStayDetails.description: Response for checking overlapping stays of reservations.

overlappingStayMessages.description: Collection of validation messages pertaining to overlapping stay.

reservationId.description: The reservation id for which the tickets has to be created.

tickets.description: Collection of tickets which have to be created.

traces.description: Return object to the request for information regarding traces.
List of traces returned/fetched as per the criteria in the fetch request.

A collection of transaction diversion rules.

transactionDiversionsInfo.description: Request to modify transaction diversion rules attached to a reservation.

hotelId.description: Property code of the reservation for which the transaction diversion rules are to be modified.

reservationId.description: Reservation Id for which the transaction diversion rules is to be modified.

transactionDiversions.description: A collection of transaction diversion rules that are to be modified.

reservationsUpgradeEligibility.description: Request object containing a list of reservation name ids, hotel code and eligibility flag.

upgradeEligibilityListType.description: List of unique identifiers of the reservations to be checked.

upgradeEligibilityType.description: Reservation name ids, hotel code and eligibility flag.

reservationId.description: Unique identifier of the reservation.

upgradeElgibilityStatus.description: Upgrade Eligibility status, it can be either Eligible, Not Eligible and unknown.

upgradeElgibilityStatusType.description: Simple type for upgrade eligibility status.

reservationId.description: Unique identifier of the reservation to be upsold.

upsell.description: Upsell information to be applied to the reservation.

override.description: Indicates whether to override validation or not.

percentageSavings.description: Percentage savings resulting from accepting upsell offer. This will be calculated as the ratio of the amount saved by accepting the upsell offer to the actual room rate (i.e. room rate when upsell is not offered)

roomType.description: Detailed information regarding room type to upsell to

firstNightAmount.description: First night upsell amount / number of points required

totalStayAmount.description: Total stay upsell amount / number of points required

rates.description: List of reservation date and its corresponding upsell rate amount

longDescription.description: Detail description of the Room Type.

webPage.description: URL providing more information about the Room Type.

bookingChannelMappings.description: Booking Channels mapping for the Room Type.

bedTypeCodes.description: Bed type code associated with room.

bedType.description: Information regarding the bed type associated with the room type.

suite.description: Indicates room type is a suite.

component.description: Indicates room type is a Component Room.

roomViewCode.description: Represents the room view code like City view, River view, Ocean view etc.

roomQualifierCode.description: Represents the room qualifier code like Deluxe,Economy,Suite etc.

roomQualifierMatchIndicator.description: Represents the match indicator of room qualifier code returned in the response with the requested room qualifier code.

accessible.description: Indicates whether room type is accessible or not.

roomFeaturesType.description: A recurring element that identifies the room features.

code.description: A code representing a room feature.

description.description: A code representing a room feature.

defaultOccupancy.description: Default occupancy of property room type.

maximumOccupancy.description: Max occupancy of property room type.

noOfPhysicalRooms.description: Number of physical rooms of property room type.

minimumOccupancy.description: Minimum occupancy of property room type.

maximumChildren.description: Maximum children occupancy of property room type.

bedTypeInfoType.description: Information representing Bed type associated with a room type.

translationTextType2000.description: Contains Multiple translated texts and language codes.

defaultText.description: Default text with Character length from 0 to 2000.

translatedTexts.description: List of translated text and language codes.

amountPointsType.description: Holds monetary value expressed with a currency code / number of points

amount.description: Monetary value expressed with a currency code

upsellDailyRatesType.description: Reservation date and its corresponding upsell rate amount

upsellDailyRateType.description: Reservation date and its corresponding upsell rate amount

requiredAmount.description: Amount / number of points required to upgrade

reservationUpsellInfo.description: Response object to the that contains information for a reservation prior to upgrade.

roomCalendarType.description: Room Calendar entry that holds Room and Reservation Information.

hotelId.description: The resort of the Room Calendar.

pageIndex.description: Current Page the group of Rooms is included in.

roomCalendarInfoType.description: Holds hotel Room and Reservation Information.

componentRoomReservationsForSuite.description: If room is a component suite , holds information about component room reservations

roomOrder.description: Order the Room is displayed based on the Room Display Room settings.

componentSuite.description: Indicates if a room is a Component Suite or not.

pseudo.description: Indicates if a room is a Pseudo room or not.

houseKeeping.description: Indicates true/false. When this flag is set to true indicates room type of the room is flagged as housekeeping.

roomOwnerStatus.description: Flag used to indicate if a room is configured as an owner exclusive room or an owner room or a regular room. This value is returned when Room Rotation OPERA Control is active.

roomCondition.description: Room Condition information if the room has an associated Room Condition.

roomCalendarResList.description: List of Reservations under this schedule.

roomScheduleCategory.description: Tells the type of Schedule Item this record is.

description.description: Description for the the Room Schedule.

start.description: The starting value of the time span.

end.description: The ending value of the time span.

roomCalendarResType.description: Reservation Information for a Reservation Item in the Calendar.

roomNumberLocked.description: Verify if the room number is locked for the reservation. When true the room number cannot be changed.

advanceCheckIn.description: Information relating to Reservation's Advance Checked In state and Expected Time of Return

roomMoveHistory.description: Room Move History for the reservation.

scheduledRoomMove.description: Information related to the room moves scheduled  for a reservation .

reservationStatus.description: Indicates the Actual status of the reservation.

hasLinkedReservations.description: Indicates whether the reservation has any linked reservation.

backToBackReservation.description: This attribute indicates if the linked reservation is marked as Back to Back or not.

scheduledRoomMoveRoomPending.description: This attribute indicates if there is a  Scheduled Move Room pending.

assignedByAI.description: Indicates whether the room was assigned by AI Room Assignment.

upgradedByAI.description: Indicates whether the room assigned by AI Room Assignment was an upgrade.

roomOwnershipType.description: Provides the information of the assigned reservation room is an Owner, Referral or regular room.This value is returned when Room Rotation OPERA Control is active and room number is assigned to a reservation.

roomCalendarDisplayType.description: Display Information for the Room Calendar.

hotelId.description: Identifies the hotel code under which room is moved.

reservationId.description: Unique identifier of the reservation.

date.description: Business date on which room is moved.

reasonCode.description: Identifies the room move reason code.

description.description: Description of why room is moved.

fromRoom.description: Room from which guest is moved.

toRoom.description: Room to which guest is moved.

movedBy.description: The user who moved the guest.

roomScheduleCategoryType.description: Enumeration of the different Room Schedule Types.

script.description: Script for a Reservation based on its StayDetails as well as itinerary.
The script for the reservation, which was requested.

fetchSellMessageConfig.description: This is the fetch response message type for fetch operation of sell messages.

sellMessageConfigs.description: Sell Messages which are retrieved as per the criteria in the request message. Refer to the generic common types document for the SellMessagesType.
Sell Messages which are retrieved as per the criteria in the request message. Refer to the generic common types document for the SellMessagesType.

totalPages.description: Evaluated total page count based on the requested max fetch count.

sellMessageConfigsType.description: The SellMessageConfigsType is the list of sell messages, each comprising of all the sell message attributes and other details.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

sellMessageConfigType.description: Only one of the following can hold a value: HotelCode, CROCode or ChainCode

blockId.description: Unique OPERA Block ID which is used to find a Block from OPERA. This ID is a primary identification of a Block in OPERA.

blockCode.description: Block Code to which the sell message is defined.

timespan.description: Begin and End date for the sell message.

hotelId.description: Hotel Code for which the sell message is defined.

croCode.description: CRO Code for which the sell message is defined.

chainCode.description: Chain Code for which the sell message is defined.

roomType.description: Room type for which the sell message is defined.

ratePlanCode.description: Rate Plan Code for which the sell message is defined.

languageCode.description: Language in which the sell message is defined.

stickyFlag.description: Sticky flag is used to define if the sell message should display on the block screen by default.

sellSequence.description: This number indicates the display order of the sell message.

usedInModule.description: This represents the moduleType where we want to display this SellMessage.

url.description: URL that identifies the location associated with the record identified by the UniqueID.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

instance.description: The identification of a record as it exists at a point in time. An instance is used in update messages where the sender must assure the server that the update sent refers to the most recent modification level of the object being updated.

idContext.description: Used to identify the source of the identifier (e.g., IATA, ABTA).

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

idExtension.description: Additional identifying value assigned by the creating system.

usedInModuleType.description: Simple type for indicating the module for which user wants to create the SellMessage. Valid module types are Look To Book Sales,Reservations,Blocks,Function Diary and Group Rooms Control.

sellMessageConfig.description: This is the request message type for sell message update operation.

sellMessageConfigs.description: A collection of Service objects. This is the collection of all services associated with any part of this reservation (the reservation in its entirety, one or more guests, or one or more room stays). Which services are attributable to which part is determined by each object's ServiceRPHs collection.

registerTurnaway.description: Request to register turn away reservation.

turnaway.description: Detailed turn away information including guest info, turn away reason and comments. Refer to the Generic common types document for information on TurnawayType.

turnawayType.description: Holds information related to prospect reservation to be turned away.

details.description: Holds detailed information of a prospect reservation to be turned away.

profileIdList.description: Holds unique guest name id of prospect reservation to be turned away.

callId.description: Holds unique call ID of prospect reservation to be turned away.

comments.description: Holds comments for a prospect reservation to be turned away.

reasonCode.description: Holds turn away code pertaining to reason of turning away prospect reservation.

turnawayDetailsType.description: Holds detailed information of a prospect reservation to be turned away.

hotelId.description: Holds Opera Hotel/Resort code of turn away reservation.

timeSpan.description: Holds Arrival and Departure Dates which covers the prospect reservation to be turned away.

marketCode.description: Holds the code that relates to the market being sold to (e.g., the corporate market, packages).

guestCounts.description: Holds the guest counts(adults or children) for the date of the stay.

futureReservationsOrBlocksDetails.description: This is the Response Message to information regarding existence of future reservation or business blocks.

response.description: response - whether there are future reservation or business blocks for the profile.

recentlyAccessedReservations.description: Response with the fetched recently accessed reservations.
