timeSpan.description: The begin and end date of the reservation.

hotelName.description: A text field used to communicate the proper name of the hotel.

reservationStatus.description: Indicates the Actual status of the reservation.

accessDate.description: The date the record was accessed.

checkReservationsDetails.description: Response for checking allowed actions, existence of attached records, or indicators of a reservation.

checkReservations.description: Collection of reservations and the status of its allowed actions, attached records, and indicators.

checkReservationsType.description: Collection of reservations and the status of its allowed actions, attached records, and indicators.

checkReservationType.description: Reservation and the status of its allowed actions, attached records, and indicators.

reservationId.description: Unique identifier of the reservation.

results.description: Collection of status of allowed actions, attached records, and indicators of the reservation.

checkResultsType.description: Collection of status of allowed actions, attached records, and indicators of the reservation.

checkResultType.description: Status of allowed actions, attached records, and indicators of the reservation.

checkInstruction.description: Indicates status of allowed actions, total number of attached records, or number of occurrences of indicator of a reservation.

exists.description: Indicates status of allowed actions, total number of attached records, or number of occurrences of indicator of a reservation.

checkInstructionType.description: Simple type that corresponds to check reservation instructions.

reservationPace.description: Contains data returned from ReservationPace Web Service call.

dailyPaceStatsType.description: a collection of reservation pace statistics.

dailyPaceStatType.description: An instance or a day of a reservation pace statistic.

consideredDate.description: The day to which the information belongs.

statisticsType.description: Collection of statistic data of a reservation.

statisticType.description: Defines all details needed to create a statistical report.

chainCode.description: The code that identifies a hotel chain or management group. The hotel chain code is decided between vendors. This attribute is optional if the hotel is an independent property that can be identified by the HotelCode attribute.

hotelId.description: The code that uniquely identifies a single hotel property. The hotel code is decided between vendors.

hotelCityCode.description: The IATA city code; for example DCA, ORD.

hotelName.description: A text field used to communicate the proper name of the hotel.

hotelCodeContext.description: A text field used to communicate the context (or source of - ex Sabre, Galileo, Worldspan, Amadeus) the HotelReferenceGroup codes.

chainName.description: The name of the hotel chain (e.g., Hilton, Marriott, Hyatt).

reportCode.description: Identifies the type of statistics collected. Each ReportCode corresponds to a set of category summaries based upon a predetermined agreement.

description.description: This element has revenue amount data for its revenue category such as Room Revenue, Food and Beverage Revenue.

statisticCodeType.description: Defines the codes and corresponding categories for which the data in the other elements has been gathered.

statCode.description: Actual code used by the system to collect the statistics (e.g. CORP, RACK if category is Market Segment).

statCategoryCode.description: Category Code category of StatCode attribute (e.g. Market Segment).

statisticSetType.description: An instance of a statistic, which is a set containing revenue category and number category summaries.

revenueCategorySummariesType.description: Collection of RevenueCategorySummary elements. Used if revenue values reported.

numericCategorySummariesType.description: Collection of CountCategorySummary elements. Used if count values reported.

weekendDate.description: Determines whether statistic date is a weekend date.

revenueCategorySummaryType.description: This element has revenue amount data for its revenue category such as Room Revenue, Food and Beverage Revenue.

revenueCategoryCode.description: The representation of a revenue category.

currencyCode.description: Provides a currency code to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.

numericCategorySummaryType.description: This element has count data for each count category such as number of guests, rooms occupied, etc.

numericSummary.description: The total count for the category in NumericCategoryCode.

numericCategoryCode.description: The representation of a numeric category such as Guests : Number of guests, RoomsOcc : Rooms occupied.

splitMultiRoomReservation.description: Request to split multi-room reservation into separate reservations.

reservationId.description: Unique identifier of the multi-room reservation that is to be split.

lockHandle.description: An identifier representing the record lock for the reservation under process. When passed, the operation will verify that the lock is still valid.

splitAll.description: If set to TRUE, the reservation will be separated into number of rooms that it currently has. Otherwise, only 1 single room reservation will be created and the original reservation will be deducted with 1 room.

copyPaymentInformation.description: Flag to instruct the operation to copy payment methods of the original reservation to the new reservation to be created.

reservationPaymentMethods.description: Defines collection of payment methods that will be copied from original reservation to the new reservation to be created.

fetchLinkedReservations.description: If set to TRUE, response will have the list of linked reservations.

fetchNewReservationIDs.description: If set to TRUE, response will have the list of unique identifiers of the reservations that were created.

splitMultiRoomReservationDetails.description: Response for splitting multi-room reservation into separate reservations.

linkedReservations.description: Collection of linked reservations which includes itinerary, shared, and created reservations from split operation. This will be returned depending on the response instruction.

newReservationIdList.description: Collection of unique identifiers of the reservations that were created by the split operation. This will be returned depending on the response instruction.

sellMessages.description: This is the Response Message Type to the request for retrieving Sell Messages.
Sell Messages which are retrieved as per the criteria in the request message. Refer to the generic common types document for the SellMessagesType.

sellMessagesType.description: The SellMessagesType is the list of message and attributes returned by web service.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

sellMessageType.description: The SellMessagesType defines the standard attributes that will be retrieved with the sell message.

croCode.description: This is the Central Reservation office code.

hotelId.description: This is the hotel code or resort.

roomType.description: This represents the room type code.

ratePlanCode.description: This represents the rate plan code of the room type.

stickyFlagYn.description: Flag which tells if this message is Sticky (Y/N).

usedInModule.description: This represents the correct moduletype which should be used for fetching SellMessages.

beginDate.description: This is the Begin date for the configured SellMessage.

url.description: URL that identifies the location associated with the record identified by the UniqueID.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

instance.description: The identification of a record as it exists at a point in time. An instance is used in update messages where the sender must assure the server that the update sent refers to the most recent modification level of the object being updated.

idContext.description: Used to identify the source of the identifier (e.g., IATA, ABTA).

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

idExtension.description: Additional identifying value assigned by the creating system.

reservationDisplayColorInfoType.description: Information of reservation display color, determined based on OPERA parameter RESERVATION_COLOR_DEFINITION

colorDefinition.description: Definition populated based on OPERA setting RESERVATION_COLOR_DEFINITION.

colorType.description: Color configuration type. This color configuration provides a visual category of entities.

frontOfficeRoomStatusType.description: Simple type for front office room status instructions to be used in requests for fetching housekeeping rooms. Valid values are Vacant and Occupied.

colorDefinitionType.description: Color definition type. This color definition type is used to determine the defintion of color

actionType.description: Action types allowed by the event api.

firstName.description: Given name, first name or names

fullName.description: String representation of the full name

fiscalInfoType.description: Fiscal related information for a reservation.

offset.description: Indicates the index of the next applicable set(page).

limit.description: Indicates number of records the API can return as per the API request limit sent. A maximum of 200 records can be only returned at a time.

count.description: Indicates number of records the API has returned actually as per the API request criteria.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether there are more records available to be returned as per the API request criteria or not.

totalResults.description: Indicates total number of records available that can be returned as per the API request criteria.

reservationIdList.description: Unique identifiers for both internal and external systems Eg: ReservationId, ConfirmationNumber, CancellationNumber, ExternalReferenceNumber etc

externalReferences.description: This type stores the External Reference information for Reservation. Confirmation Number is also supported here if its having a valid non default leg number identifiable via idContext as OPERA

blockIdList.description: Unique identifiers for Blocks. Eg: BlockId, BlockCode

rateCode.description: Rate code used for the reservation.

creatorId.description: Internal User ID used to create reservation.

lastModifierId.description: Internal User ID used to update the reservation details.

paymentType.description: Payment method used for the reservation.

originCode.description: Channel used to create the reservation.

preRegistered.description: Indicates whether the reservation is pre-registered for internet check-in or not.

advancedCheckedIn.description: Indicates if the reservation has performed an Advance Check In.

shared.description: Indicates if the reservation is shared or not.

distinctIDType.description: Unique identifiers for both internal and external systems Eg: ReservationId, ConfirmationNumber, CancellationNumber, ExternalReferenceNumber etc

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element. Eg: Reservation, Confirmation, Cancellation, ExternalReference etc

idExtension.description: Additional identifying value assigned by the creating system. Eg: ConfirmationLegNumber, ExternalLegNumber

companyId.description: ID of the company for the reservation.

companyName.description: Name of the company for the reservation.

groupID.description: ID of the group for the reservation.

groupName.description: Name of the group for the reservation.

travelAgentID.description: ID of the travel agent for the reservation.

travelAgentName.description: Name of the travel agent for the reservation.

reservationsSummary.description: Response object to the Fetch Reservations information. Based on the criteria, reservation information is returned.

reservationMembershipAwardType.description: This type contains information of a membership award attached to a reservation.

membershipType.description: Membership type for which awards are defined.

nameOnCard.description: Name to be displayed on the membership card.

membershipCardNo.description: The card number associated with this membership.

awardBasedOn.description: Indicates if the Award is based on RATE, PRODUCT or UPGRADE.

awardType.description: Unique code that identifies this award.

pointsRequired.description: Number of points required for the award.

dateAwarded.description: Date when the award was issued.

arrivalDate.description: The arrival date of the stay for when the award is associated.

awardCancelDate.description: If the reservation associated with the award was cancelled, the reservation cancellation date appears here.

cancelPenaltyDays.description: The cancel days, set up in awards configuration that establishes the number of days before arrival when a reservation may be cancelled without an award points penalty.

cancelPenaltyPoints.description: The award points that will be deducted (based on a cancel days restriction) if the award is cancelled. (Cancel days, set up in awards configuration, and establish the number of days before arrival when a reservation may be cancelled without an award points penalty).

actualCancelPoints.description: The number of points actually deducted from the member's total award points if there is a penalty points restriction associated with the award cancellation.

awardCancellationNo.description: Unique ID for the award cancellation if cancelled.

stayDate.description: The date of the reservation associated with the award.

reservations.description: Collection of Reservations returned/fetched as per the criteria in the fetch request.

channelInformation.description: Information to be returned, if the request is received through a channel

reservationStatus.description: Indicates the Actual status of the reservation.

reservationKeyInfoType.description: Holds the room key information provided by the Door Lock System.

keyPin.description: PIN provided in keyTrack3 from the Door Lock System that is used to unlock a room. This is supported when Key Pin handling is active for the property and the Door Lock System in use.

departureReservationInfoType.description: Key information about the departure reservation.

reservationExpectedDepartureTime.description: The departure Reservation Expected Departure Time.

reservationStatus.description: Indicates the Actual status of the departure reservation.

roomOwnerStatusType.description: Enumeration of different ownership statuses of room

linkedReservationsCommonDetailsType.description: Details common to all linked reservations.

linkedName.description: Name associated with a group of linked reservations.

changeLinkedReservationsCommonDetails.description: Request object for updating linked reservations details.

linkedReservationsCommonDetails.description: Updated values of details common to all linked reservations.
Response object for updating linked reservations details.
Updated values of details common to all linked reservations.

changeLinkedReservationType.description: Request object to change a linked reservation information.

linkedReservationInfo.description: Linked reservation information that needs to be changed.

backToBackToReservationId.description: Unique identifier of the source linked reservation to be marked as Back to Back along with a target linked reservation when the target linked reservation is marked as Back to Back.

backToBackResSequenceType.description: Type object represents Back To Back Sequence Position and Total Count of Linked Back To Back Reservations ordered by consecutive Stay Dates.

position.description: Indicates the Sequence position of Back to Back Reservation.

totalCount.description: Indicates the total count of Back To Back Reservations in the group of Linked Reservations.

roomIsOccupied.description: Indicates if the Room is currently occupied.

estimatedDepartureTime.description: Estimated Time of Departure of reservation when room status is occupied.

guestFirstName.description: Guest First/Given Name on reservation when room status is occupied.

guestLastName.description: Guest Last Name /Surname on reservation when room status is occupied.

reservationIdList.description: A list of Ids for reservation( ResvNameId and ConfirmationNumber).

roomNumberLocked.description: This attribute is to verify if room number is locked for the reservation. When true the room number cannot be changed. This is supported when OPERA Control Do Not Move is active.

combineShareFromExistingReservationType.description: Details of the existing reservation to be combined as a sharer.

routeAllTransactionsToShareReservationId.description: Reservation ID of an existing reservation to whom all transactions of the joining reservation will be routed to.

dailyRates.description: Collection of room rate information on a daily basis.

moveInRoomOccupancyInfo.description: Scheduled Move In Room Occupancy Information.

scheduledRoomMoveInfo.description: Scheduled Room Move information for a reservation.

roomAssignmentSegmentEnd.description: Date of the Scheduled Move Room.

roomNumberLocked.description: This attribute is to verify if room number is locked for the reservation. When true the room number cannot be changed. This is supported when OPERA Control Do Not Move is active.

scheduledRoomMoveStatusType.description: Flag indicating scheduled room move status.

checkDistributionReservationsSummaryType.description: Reservation Statistics and the status of its allowed actions, attached records.

reservationId.description: ReservationId of Reservation.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee responsible for the creation.

checkDistributionReservationsSummary.description: Response for checking allowed actions, existence of attached records, or count of reservations.

checkReservations.description: Collection of reservations Count and the status of its allowed actions, attached records.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

bookingTimeSpanType.description: The booking time span of the reservation, only applicable when time increments are being used.

startDateTime.description: The start time of the reservation booking

endDateTime.description: The end time of the reservation booking

changePayeeSharerType.description: Request object to to mark or unmark the payee sharer information.

shareReservation.description: Information of the Shared reservation to be updated.

payeeSharerInfoType.description: Holds the information to mark or unmark a shared reservation as a payee sharer.

reservationId.description: Unique identifier of the reservation.

payeeSharer.description: This attribute indicates if the Shared reservation is marked as the Payee Sharer or not.

refreshRoutings.description: This attribute indicates if the routing created/removed when updating payee needs to be refreshed or not.

consumptionDetails.description: Package consumption details. Includes information for quantity , allowance etc.

packageCode.description: Package code. This is the unique code used for the package and is a required element.

internalId.description: Reservation Package Opera Internal Unique Id. This is the unique Id used for this reservation package.

packageGroup.description: Package group code. Package group code is used to link multiple packages that are members of a group.

source.description: Indicates if the source of the product is Rate header, Rate Detail or Reservation. For new development this field is to be used for passing the product scource

awardCode.description: This is the Award code used to redeem the package if the package is a redemption package.

points.description: Indicates the points used to redeem the redemption package.

calculationRule.description: The price calculation rule for this package.

reservationAddOnPackagesType.description: A Service object represents a non-room product provided to guests. Service products may have associated inventory and charges.

reservationPackages.description: A Service object represents a package provided to guests. Service packages may have associated inventory and charges.

overridePackageConfiguration.description: Indicates if scheduleList and calculationRule provided in this request should override package configuration. When overridePackageConfiguration is true the scheduleList is mandatory.

overrideInventoryItemAvailabilty.description: Indicates if Availablity should be overriden when an Inventory Item based on a package is not available.

reservationId.description: Unique identifier of the reservation.

reservationPackages.description: A Service object represents a package provided to guests. Service packages may have associated inventory and charges.

moveInRoomOccupancyInfo.description: Scheduled Move In Room Occupancy Information.

scheduledRoomMoveDetails.description: Details regarding a specific scheduled room move.

scheduledMoveTime.description: The scheduled time of room move.

scheduledRoomMoveFrom.description: Indicates if the reservation is scheduled to be moved from a room

scheduledRoomMoveTo.description: Indicates if the reservation is scheduled to be moved to a room

scheduleRoomMoveType.description: Type of room move scheduled either from or to information

scheduleRoomMoveStatus.description: Indicates if the reservation is scheduled to be moved from or to a room.

scheduleRoomMoveDate.description: Business date on which room is scheduled to be moved from or to another room.

scheduleMoveRoomNumber.description: Room to which guest is scheduled to be moved.

scheduledMoveTime.description: The scheduled time of room move.

attachDetachType.description: This type contains attach and detach information for accompanying guest profile.

attachDateTime.description: Time stamp the accompanying guest was last attached.

detachDateTime.description: Time stamp the accompanying guest was last detached.

detached.description: This attribute indicates if the accompanying guest is marked as detached or attached.

validatePoliciesType.description: Request object to fetch deposit and cancellation policies.

guaranteeCode.description: Guarantee Code should be supplied only for the code verification purpose, if the supplied code is valid for the rest of the criteria it will return the response with the Guarantee Code information.

calculateEstimateAmount.description: Determines whether estimated amount to be calculated or not

reservationPackages.description: A Service object represents a non-room product provided to guests. Service products may have associated inventory and charges.

rates.description: A collection of Room Rates associated with this Stay.

rateSearchType.description: Room Rate associated with a particular segment of the Stay.

reservationGuaranteesPolicies.description: Response object to fetch reservation guarantees.

guaranteePolcies.description: A collection of Guarantee Codes information with cancellation penalty and deposit policy information.

flexFieldValues.description: Request object for flex fields values.

flexFieldValueType.description: Provides the details of a flex field values

totalPages.description: Evaluated total page count based on the requested max fetch count

offset.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned

limit.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response

externalDailyRateType.description: Room rate information provided by an external CRS application on a daily basis for this reservation.

startDate.description: Start date of the reservation stay.

endDate.description: End date of the reservation stay. If the same rate amounts need to be applied to a date range of the reservation stay, then the Start Date and End Date would specify the range.

rateAmount.description: The rate amount per room or per share on the specific reservation stay date.

currencyCode.description: The code specifying a monetary unit. Use ISO 4217, three alpha code.

changePackageQuantityType.description: Request object to update package quantity for package codes.

packageQuantityInfo.description: Information of the package codes and their consumed quantity.

packageQuantityInfoType.description: Information regarding a single package quantity

packageInfoType.description: Package information related to a reservation

packageCode.description: The unique code identifying the package.

packageCategoryInfo.description: Information about the category of the package.

consumptionDate.description: The consumption date of the package.

reservationDate.description: The reservation date of the package.

consumedQuantity.description: The quantity of the package that has been consumed

calculatedQuantity.description: The quantity of the package calculated to be consumed based on the package's quantity and the calculation rule

quantity.description: Quantity of packages to be attached i.e. the multiplier to be applied against the calculation rule to determine the calculated quantity of the packages

calculationRule.description: The price calculation rule for this package

unitPrice.description: The price per unit of the package

forecastConsumptionDate.description: The forecasted consumption date of the package.

packageCategoryDescription.description: A description of the package category.

separateShareReservation.description: Request to separate Share Reservation and apply rate amounts to separated and remaining share reservations from room rates provided by an external application on a daily basis.

criteria.description: Criteria to separate Share Reservation and apply rate amounts to separated and remaining share reservations from room rates provided by an external application. To be used when OPERA Control parameter 'External Availability, Rates and Inventory' is active and OPERA Control parameter 'Share Rate Amount from External System Definition' is set to 'Share' or 'Room'.

separateShareReservationType.description: Type to separate Share Reservation and apply rate amounts to separated and remaining share reservations from room rates provided by an external application.

dailyRateDistributionCriteria.description: Criteria to distribute room rates provided by an external application to separated and remaining share reservations on a daily basis.
Criteria to distribute and apply rate amounts to separated and remaining share reservations from room rates provided by an external application.

externalDailyRatesForSeparatedShare.description: Collection of room rate information provided by an external application on a daily basis to be applied to share reservation based on the share rate distribution method. To be used when OPERA Control parameter 'External Availability, Rates and Inventory' is active and OPERA Control parameter 'Share Rate Amount from External System Definition' is set to 'Room'.

externalDailyRatesForRemainingShares.description: Collection of room rate information provided by an external application on a daily basis to be applied to share reservation based on the share rate distribution method. To be used when OPERA Control parameter 'External Availability, Rates and Inventory' is active and OPERA Control parameter 'Share Rate Amount from External System Definition' is set to 'Room'.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

tags.name: ReservationExternal
tags.description: The Reservation External module provides operations for OPERA Cloud to access reservations from external interfaces.

tags.name: Reservation
tags.description: The REST APIs allow you to perform all actions related to reservations from creating a new reservation, to adding on sharers, updating packages, item inventory and even pre-checking in a reservation.

tags.name: RSVStats
tags.description: The Reservation Statistics Service provides statistical data for reservations that exist in OPERA Cloud.
